height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Fri, 09 Apr 2021 20:47:05 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/6070a7b94943790018bb1b65?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"c5a202a70dfdaa067667c8b60da38cc0","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn4@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-45-35-476_a3119cc49c72e596.webp","destWidth":2220,"destHeight":1665,"sourceBytes":102508,"destBytes":102508,"author":"pyeo@businessinsider.com (Patricia Kelly Yeo)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/6070a7b94943790018bb1b65?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn4@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-45-35-476_a3119cc49c72e596.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn43@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-46-06-040_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=wJbv0ueIy-E:Nz5yb4ndLaY:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn16@2020_2/2021/04/10/03-45-59-837_9a07a268776057bb.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=wJbv0ueIy-E:Nz5yb4ndLaY:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn39@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-45-56-491_80d99c634e518e91.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn75@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-46-00-486_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=wJbv0ueIy-E:Nz5yb4ndLaY:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn15@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-45-55-125_5a3a60ef79d1ae73.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/wJbv0ueIy-E":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn83@2020_4/2021/04/10/03-46-06-364_bfecef50a3591f7a.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1618026331594},{"createdTime":"2021-04-10 11:45:31","updatedTime":"2021-04-10 11:45:31","title":"A man in Texas was arrested on suspicion of trying to buy explosives from an undercover FBI agent as part of a plot to blow up data centers","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/man-in-texas-tried-to-buy-explosives-to-blow-up-data-centers-2021-4","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070a0044943790018bb1b2c?format=jpeg\" alt=\"C-4 explosive blasting cap\" height=\"1000\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>A Marine inserts blasting caps into blocks of C-4 explosive, February 1, 2005.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Pfc. Lukas J. Blom</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>A man in Texas has been charged with purchasing inert explosives from an undercover FBI agent.</li>\n<li>Investigators say Seth Pendley, 28, planned to blow up data centers that federal agencies rely upon.</li>\n<li>Pendley boasted on Facebook about the Capitol riot, but told friends he never entered the building.</li>\n<li id=\"recirc\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">See more stories on Insider&#39;s business page</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>A man in Texas has been charged with attempting to purchase an explosive device from an undercover FBI agent, according to the <a href=\"https://www.justice.gov/usao-ndtx/pr/texas-man-charged-intent-attack-data-centers\">Department of Justice.</a> </p><p>Seth Pendley, 28, made his first appearance in federal court on Friday morning in the Northern District of Texas. </p><p>According to the criminal complaint, an anonymous person contacted the FBI on January 8 after finding posts on MyMilitia.com, a forum devoted to organizing militias, about planning to &#34;conduct a little experiment&#34; that would &#34;draw a lot of heat&#34; and result in &#34;death.&#34; The source gave the FBI the user&#39;s email address, which investigators traced to Pendley.</p><p>After reviewing Pendley&#39;s Facebook accounts, federal investigators found he &#34;boasted&#34; about being at the US Capitol insurrection on January 6 - two days before an informant warned the FBI about his online posts- but privately told friends he never entered the building itself. Investigators allege he also admitted to bringing a sawed-off rifle to the city on January 6, <a href=\"https://code.dccouncil.us/dc/council/code/sections/22-4514.html#:~:text=(a)%20No%20person%20shall%20within,for%20causing%20the%20firing%20of\">a crime in itself in Washington, DC</a>, but that he left the weapon in his car during the riots.</p><p>According to the court filings, a confidential source connected Pendley with an undercover FBI agent who Pendley believed to be an explosives supplier. Prosecutors allege Pendley told the agent he wanted to bring down &#34;the oligarchy&#34; in the US by attacking Amazon AWS web servers that federal agencies rely upon, most of which were located in Virginia.</p><p>&#34;The main objective is to f--k up the Amazon servers,&#34; prosecutors accuse Pendley of saying. &#34;There&#39;s 24 buildings that all this data runs through in America. Three of them are right next to each other, and 24 run 70 percent of the Internet. And the government especially the higher-ups, CIA, FBI, special s--t, they have like an 8 billion dollar a year contract with Amazon to run through their servers. So we f--k those servers, and it&#39;s gonna piss all the oligarchy off.&#34;</p><div class=\"insider-raw-embed\"><iframe src=\"https://embed.documentcloud.org/documents/20612405-seth-pendley-complaint/?embed=1&title=1le=1\" title=\"Seth Pendley complaint (Hosted by DocumentCloud)\" width=\"700\" height=\"905\" style=\"border: 1px solid #aaa;\" sandbox=\"allow-scripts allow-same-origin allow-popups allow-forms allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox\"></iframe></div><p> </p><p>On Thursday, Pendley met with the undercover agent once more to acquire what he believed to be active explosives, but the FBI agent supplied him with inert devices instead, and explained his motives to the agent. According to the DOJ, agents promptly arrested Pendley after he had placed the fake explosives into his vehicle. </p><p>After searching Pendley&#39;s home, investigators said they found hand-drawn maps, flashcards relating to the planned attack, a piece of sawed-off rifle, wigs and masks, and a machete with his username from MyMilitia.com affixed onto the blade.</p><p>Acting US Attorney Prerak Shah praised investigators in a statement for apprehending Pendley before he had a chance to endanger people or infrastructure.</p><p>&#34;We are also incredibly proud of our FBI partners, who ensured that the defendant was apprehended with an inert explosive device before he could inflict real harm, Shah said. &#34;The Justice Department is determined to apprehend domestic extremists who intend to commit violence, no matter what political sentiment drives them to do so.&#34;</p><p>A spokesperson for Amazon told Insider it would continue to monitor for any outside threats against its staff and data servers.</p><p>&#34;We would like to thank the FBI for their work in this investigation,&#34; the spokesperson said. &#34;We take the safety and security of our staff and customer data incredibly seriously, and constantly review various vectors for any potential threats. We will continue to retain this vigilance about our employees and customers.&#34;</p><p>Pendley&#39;s specific charges have yet to be announced, but the DOJ said he faces up to 20 years in prison if convicted.</p><p>Prosecutors have not announced whether Pendley will face any charges stemming from the Capitol siege on January 6. In three months, authorities have <a href=\"https://www.insider.com/all-the-us-capitol-pro-trump-riot-arrests-charges-names-2021-1\">arrested over 400 people</a> involved in the attack.</p><div Hall)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/6070a0044943790018bb1b2c?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn21@2020_4/2021/04/10/03-45-54-656_a2868ffeb08e15bd.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn43@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-46-06-040_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=dU2_b5voDAg:8qiJt1_qSIA:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn76@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-45-59-320_325b27e1e871531d.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=dU2_b5voDAg:8qiJt1_qSIA:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn27@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-46-09-619_92d337eae421d666.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn75@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-46-00-486_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=dU2_b5voDAg:8qiJt1_qSIA:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn39@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-46-00-059_98ad9019f6e32744.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/dU2_b5voDAg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn55@2020_4/2021/04/10/03-46-04-189_964ac80388b4f68e.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1618026331630},{"createdTime":"2021-04-10 11:45:31","updatedTime":"2021-04-10 11:45:31","title":"I've tested hundreds of skincare products as a beauty editor and this facial exfoliator is still my favorite - I've been using it for over a decade","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/kate-somerville-exfolikate-intensive-exfoliating-treatment-review","description":"<p class=\"financial-disclaimer\"><i>If you buy through our links, we may earn money from affiliate partners. <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.insider-inc.com/commerce-on-insider-inc/\">Learn more.</a></i></p><p><a href=\"https://shop-links.co/1711970640539642798\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow nofollow noopener sponsored sponsored nofollow sponsored\"><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f08943a3ad861122a7c0ae5?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Kate Somerville ExfoliKate\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Kate Somerville/Facebook</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></a></p><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li><strong><a href=\"https://shop-links.co/1711970640539642798\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow nofollow noopener sponsored\">Kate Somerville&#39;s ExfoliKate Treatment</a> has been a beauty cult classic for more than a decade.</strong></li>\n<li><strong>It&#39;s been called the &#34;Hollywood 2-minute facial,&#34; and it&#39;s totally deserving of the title. </strong></li>\n<li><strong>Today only, Kate Somerville is offering Insider readers 30% off everything with promo code BIFAM30.</strong></li>\n</ul><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5e45c74d4b661b15815b1416\" data-purchase-option=\"\">ExfoliKate Intensive Exfoliating Treatment (small)</bi-shortcode><p>Throughout my years as a beauty editor, I&#39;ve scrubbed my face with hundreds of exfoliating treatments - both physical (which use tiny granules to get rid of dead skin) and chemical (which use acids).</p><p>Some worked, others didn&#39;t. A few left my sensitive skin red and irritated, but most failed to leave any impression whatsoever.</p><p>Well, one afternoon more than a decade ago, I was invited to Kate Somerville&#39;s spa in Los Angeles where I was introduced to the skincare guru herself, as well as one of her trademark products that would change my facial regimen forever - the <a href=\"https://shop-links.co/1711970640539642798\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">ExfoliKate Intensive Exfoliating Treatment</a>.</p><p>In case you don&#39;t understand the importance of exfoliating, <a href=\"https://www.doctorsaedi.com\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Nazanin Saedi, MD</a>, a board-certified dermatologist and director of the Laser Surgery and Cosmetic Center, explains that it&#39;s a crucial step in helping the skin rid itself of the dead cell debris, which allows for skin renewal and regrowth. </p><p>This tube of green, pumpkin-scented scrub was - and still is - the best exfoliating treatment I have ever used. It works in just two minutes to transform my rough and dry skin to baby soft without any irritation - and without visiting the LA spa. </p><h2><strong>What it is</strong></h2><p><a href=\"https://shop-links.co/1711970640539642798\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Kate Somerville&#39;s ExfoliKate Intensive Exfoliating Treatment</a> is a dual-action exfoliator, so it works physically and chemically. It has natural enzymes as well as physical granules to remove dead skin, clean out clogged pores, and give skin a more fresh-faced appearance. </p><p>Somerville created the product back in 2006 for her celebrity clients because they weren&#39;t able to get into the spa for regular facials - like when they were on extended trips for work - and this concoction basically served as a facial in a bottle. In 2007, she started selling the product at her spa and on QVC, where <a href=\"https://people.com/archive/an-a-list-beauty-guru-vol-67-no-16/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">it sold out in just six minutes</a>. It&#39;s still currently her bestselling product with reportedly double-digit growth every year.  </p><p>The exfoliator is free of all parabens, sulfates, and phthalates. Papaya, pineapple, and pumpkin enzymes naturally smooth skin without overdrying, while lactic acid offers the &#34;chemical&#34; component as a natural alpha hydroxy acid that exfoliates. The combination of rosewood and cinnamon extracts work to help reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, and aloe vera, honey, and vitamin E smooth and soften skin. </p><h2><strong>How to use it</strong></h2><p>The brand recommends using the product once or twice a week, either in the morning or at night.</p><p><a href=\"https://shop-links.co/1711970640539642798\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">The treatment</a> is really easy to use. All you have to do is apply a thin layer to clean, wet skin, and then gently massage it into your skin for about 30 seconds. You might feel a slight tingling on your face, which means the product is starting to work its magic. Leave it on for one minute if you have sensitive skin, or up to two for other skin types. Your skin will continue to tingle slightly as you wait. Once you&#39;re ready, rinse off the product and pat dry - and that&#39;s it. </p><p><a href=\"https://shop-links.co/1711970640539642798\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\"><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f08960b19182426e53ddb93?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Kate Somerville ExfoliKate \" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Kate Somerville/Facebook</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></a></p><p>My favorite part of the process is feeling the results. After more than a decade of use, the product never fails to impress. My skin always feels like it just spend an hour in the hands of a facialist - soft, smooth, and silky. </p><h2><strong>Other considerations </strong></h2><p>Even though you might become totally obsessed with this product and its instant results, make sure not to overuse it.</p><p>&#34;I think the biggest issue with exfoliation is that people like to do it too often,&#34; Dr. Saedi explains. &#34;If you over-exfoliate, you&#39;re stripping natural oils from your skin and that can lead to overproduction of oil.&#34; She recommends just using it two to three times a week. </p><p>If your skin damage is next level, board certified plastic surgeon <a href=\"http://dermguy.com/dr-jason-d-bloom/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Jason Bloom, MD</a> suggests looking into something a little more powerful, like a chemical peel or lasers. Treatments such as <a href=\"http://www.picosure.com/how-does-it-work/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">PicoSure</a> can penetrate deeper within your skin in order to kickstart collagen growth, helping to alleviate dark spots, acne scars, hyperpigmentation, and even fine lines and wrinkles. Obviously these sort of treatments are going to cost a whole lot more than a tube of <a href=\"https://shop-links.co/1711970640539642798\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">ExfoliKate</a>, so you want might want to try this product first - and definitely consult with your dermatologist.</p><p>And if you&#39;re currently using retinol products, or are getting laser or any other resurfacing treatments, you might want to speak with your dermatologist or esthetician before using any sort of exfoliating products too. I&#39;ve made this mistake, and my skin ended up red and irritated.</p><h2><strong>The bottom line</strong></h2><p>Without a doubt, this is the best facial exfoliator that I have ever used.</p><p>While the price is steep - <a href=\"https://shop-links.co/1737292100302521046\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">$88 for 2 oz</a> or <a href=\"https://shop-links.co/1711970735233219063\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\">$185 for 5 oz</a> - you get what you pay for in results. My experience is that a tube lasts a long time - six months to a year - but obviously that depends on how often you use it. If you aren&#39;t willing to invest in a full-size tube, you can try out the <a href=\"https://shop-links.co/1737292179062508661\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\">0.5 ounce travel-size for just $25</a>.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"button\" data-pid=\"5e45c74d4b661b15815b1416\" data-purchase-option=\"\">ExfoliKate src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070ab5fa451820019b3a5bc?format=jpeg\" alt=\"happy trader\" height=\"3002\" width=\"6005\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Xinhua/Wang Ying/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul><li><strong>US stocks were mixed on Friday after higher-than-expected inflation data sparked a rally in interest rates.</strong></li><li><strong>The producer price index rose 1% in March, and saw a year-over-year surge of 4.2%.</strong></li><li id=\"recirc\"><a href=\"https://newsletter.businessinsider.com/join/4np/10-things-opening-bell?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestm=ingest\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\" data-stringify-link=\"https://newsletter.businessinsider.com/join/4np/10-things-opening-bell\" data-sk=\"tooltip_parent\"><strong data-stringify-type=\"bold\">Sign</strong><strong data-stringify-type=\"bold\"> </strong><strong data-stringify-type=\"bold\">up</strong><strong data-stringify-type=\"bold\"> here for our daily newsletter, 10 Things Before the Opening Bell</strong></a><strong data-stringify-type=\"bold\">.</strong></li></ul><hr><p>US stocks closed at record highs on Friday as investors shrugged off concerns of a jump in inflation, as the <a href=\"https://www.bls.gov/news.release/ppi.nr0.htm\">release of producer price index data</a> for the month of March showed a jump of 1%, and a year-over-year increase of 4.2%.</p><p>The higher-than-expected inflation data briefly sparked a rally in interest rates, with the 10-Year US Treasury yield rising five basis points to a daily high of 1.68%.</p><p>A spike in inflation has been a key concern for investors as the US economy begins to reopen, as some worry that a runaway inflation scenario could materialize when considering the trillions of dollars in stimulus unleashed on the economy since the beginning of the COVID-19 pandemic.</p><p>But Fed Chairman Jerome Powell continues to <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/fed-jerome-powell-inflation-patient-stimulus-treasury-yields-reopening-monetarypolicy-2021-3\">reiterate his view that any spike in inflation will be temporary,</a> which investors seem to be believing today. </p><p><strong>Here&#39;s where US indexes stood at the 4:00 p.m. ET close on Friday:</strong></p><ul><li><strong><a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/index/s&p_500_500\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">S&#38;P 500</a>:</strong> 4,128.75, up 0.77%</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/index/dow_jones\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Dow Jones industrial average</a>:</strong> 33,802.78, up 0.89% (299.21 points)</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/index/nasdaq_composite\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Nasdaq composite</a>:</strong> 13,900.19, up 0.51%</li></ul><p>More details are emerging from the epic blow-up of Bill Hwang&#39;s Archegos Capital family office, <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/news/stocks/bill-hwang-lost-20-billion-2-days-archegos-collapse-report-2021-4-1030288757\">which reportedly lost $20 billion in just two days.</a></p><p>Auction house Christie&#39;s continues to set its sights on the budding NFT industry. The firm said it <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/currencies/news/christies-auction-cryptopunk-nfts-larva-labs-ethereum-ether-cryptoart-2021-4-1030288724\">is planning to auction off a set of 9 CryptoPunk NFTs for up to $9 million next month.</a></p><p>Beyond Meat could soon be joined by another alternative meat company in the public markets, <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/news/stocks/impossible-foods-ipo-spac-stock-market-listing-10-billion-valuation-2021-4-1030288368\">with Impossible Foods exploring an IPO at a $10 billion valuation.</a> Beyond Meat is currently worth about $8 billion.</p><p>A surge in bitcoin trading volumes is spurring Coinbase rival <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/currencies/news/coinbase-kraken-ipo-cryptocurrency-exchange-direct-listing-bitcoin-trading-2021-4-1030288764\">Kraken to explore going public next year.</a> Coinbase is set to direct list its shares on April 14. </p><p><a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/news/stocks/fubotv-stock-price-secures-streaming-rights-world-cup-2022-matches-2021-4-1030289395\">FuboTV soared as much as 22%</a> after it secured exclusive streaming rights to the qualifying soccer matches of the 2022 World Cup. </p><p>Oil prices were lower. <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/commodities/oil-price?type=wti\">West Texas Intermediate crude</a> fell 0.37%, to $59.37 per barrel. <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/commodities/oil-price?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestts&#38;utm_medium=ingest\">Brent crude</a>, oil&#39;s international benchmark, dropped by 0.25%, to $63.04 per barrel.</p><p><a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/commodities/gold-price\">Gold</a> fell 0.8%, to $1,743.70 per ounce.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/stock-market-news-today-record-highs-investors-dismiss-inflation-concerns-2021-4'>Business 'WandaVision'","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/marvel-disney-plus","description":"<p class=\"financial-disclaimer\"><i>If you buy through our links, we may earn money from affiliate partners. <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.insider-inc.com/commerce-on-insider-inc/\">Learn more.</a></i></p><p><a href=\"https://disneyplus.bn5x.net/c/196318/972430/9358\" target=\"_blank\" Marvel TV shows.</li>\n<li>That includes new original series like &#34;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-watch-the-falcon-and-the-winter-soldier\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">The Falcon and the Winter Soldier</a>&#34; and &#34;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-watch-wandavision\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">WandaVision</a>.&#34;</li>\n<li><strong>The service costs $8/month or $80/year, and there&#39;s also a <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/disney-plus-bundle\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">bundle with Hulu and ESPN+ for $14/month</a>.</strong></li>\n</ul><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5dc5bb627eece5443d2df8b9\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Monthly Subscription Service (small)</bi-shortcode><p>One of the biggest draws of <a href=\"https://disneyplus.bn5x.net/c/196318/972430/9358\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Disney Plus</a> is its massive collection of Marvel movies and TV shows, ranging from classic &#39;80s cartoons to the latest entries in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. The full lineup is included with a Disney Plus subscription for $8 a month or $80 a year.</p><p>After a full year without a new Marvel movie in theaters, Disney Plus is debuting four new MCU shows in 2021. &#34;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-watch-wandavision\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">WandaVision</a>&#34; was one of the most talked about shows online during its nine-episode run, and was immediately followed by &#34;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-watch-the-falcon-and-the-winter-soldier\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">The Falcon and the Winter Soldier</a>.&#34; &#34;Loki&#34; will debut on June 11, followed by &#34;Ms. Marvel&#34; in late 2021. </p><p>These exclusive shows will join the dozens of Marvel movies already on Disney Plus, including most of Fox&#39;s &#34;X-Men&#34; and &#34;Fantastic Four&#34; films. Disney plans to release &#34;Black Widow&#34; in theaters on July 9 and you&#39;ll be able to stream it the same day with <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/disney-plus-premiere-access\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Disney Plus Premier Access.</a> </p><aside class=\"quick-tip headline-regular\"><p><strong>Updated on 4/9/2021 by Kevin Webb:</strong> We&#39;ve updated this article to include new trailers for upcoming Marvel shows, the official release date for &#34;Black Widow,&#34; and a price increase for Disney Plus.</p></aside><h2>What Marvel movies and shows can I watch on Disney Plus?</h2><p><a href=\"https://disneyplus.bn5x.net/c/196318/972430/9358\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored\">Disney Plus</a> is home to nearly every Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) movie released so far. With that said, a few titles, like &#34;Spider-Man: Homecoming,&#34; aren&#39;t included since they were <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/why-some-marvel-cinematic-universe-movies-arent-on-disney-plus-2019-11\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">produced by different studios.</a></p><p>Beyond the MCU movie lineup, new spin-off series focused on various Marvel characters will be available on Disney Plus as well. The first new Marvel show, &#34;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-watch-wandavision\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">WandaVision</a>,&#34; premiered on January 15.</p><h2>Are &#39;X-Men&#39; and &#39;Fantastic Four&#39; films available on Disney Plus?</h2><p>Though <a href=\"https://disneyplus.bn5x.net/c/196318/972430/9358\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Disney Plus</a> initially launched in the US without any of 20th Century Fox&#39;s Marvel movies, the service now includes select &#34;X-Men&#34; and &#34;Fantastic Four&#34; titles from Fox.</p><p>20th Century Fox produced several Marvel films featuring the X-Men, Fantastic Four, Daredevil, and Deadpool characters before the studio was acquired by Disney in 2019. It&#39;s possible that additional Fox movies from these franchises will be added to Disney Plus in the future. That said, any R-rated films, like &#34;Logan&#34; and &#34;Deadpool,&#34; are unlikely to ever be included.</p><h2>What order should I watch the Marvel films in?</h2><p>Though different Marvel Studios movies take place at different points in the MCU&#39;s timeline, the best order to watch the movies in is the same order that they were originally released in theaters. The filmmakers designed the overarching storyline to be best viewed this way. </p><h3>A breakdown of the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/marvel-disney-plus#marvel-movies-1\">Marvel movie release timeline</a> can be found below, along with a full rundown of every Marvel film and show available on Disney Plus:</h3>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tMarvel Cinematic Universe movies\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5da73206cc4a0a53ec75d793?format=jpeg\" alt=\"iron man imdb\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">IMDb</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Below is a complete list of MCU movies in the order they were originally released. This is the order that we recommend watching the films in.</p><p>Due to existing licensing agreements, some Marvel movies are not yet available on Disney Plus, and certain films are not expected to arrive on the service at all. We've denoted the missing titles in bold, along with details on when/if they are coming to Disney Plus.</p><p>All of the other movies listed below are available to stream right now on Disney Plus.</p><ul><li>\"Iron Man\" (2008)</li><li><strong>\"The Incredible Hulk\" (2008) - not planned for Disney Plus</strong></li><li>\"Iron Man 2\" (2010)&#160;</li><li>\"Thor\" (2011)</li><li>\"Captain America: The First Avenger\" (2011)</li><li>\"The Avengers\" (2012)</li><li>\"Iron Man 3\" (2013)</li><li>\"Thor: The Dark World\" (2013)</li><li>\"Captain America: The Winter Soldier\" (2014)</li><li>\"Guardians of the Galaxy\" (2014)</li><li>\"Avengers: Age of Ultron\" (2015)</li><li>\"Ant-Man\" (2015)</li><li>\"Captain America: Civil War\" (2016)</li><li>\"Doctor Strange\" (2016)</li><li>\"Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2\" (2017)</li><li><strong>\"Spider-Man: Homecoming\" (2017) - not planned for Disney Plus</strong></li><li>\"Thor: Ragnarok\" (2017)</li><li>\"Black Panther\" (2018)</li><li>\"Avengers: Infinity War\" (2018)</li><li>\"Ant-Man and the Wasp\" (2018)</li><li>\"Captain Marvel\" (2019)</li><li>\"Avengers: Endgame\" (2019)</li><li><strong>\"Spider-Man: Far from Home\" (2019) - not planned for Disney Plus</strong></li></ul><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5dc5bb627eece5443d2df8b9\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Monthly Subscription Service (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\t20th Century Fox Marvel movies\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f242f524dca682bb8130e77?format=jpeg\" alt=\"X Men Fox\" height=\"680\" width=\"907\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Fox</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>In addition to MCU movies, Disney Plus also includes a few Marvel movies from 20th Century Fox. Here are the Marvel movies from Fox that are available on Disney Plus in the US:</p><ul><li>\"X-Men\" (2000)&#160;</li><li>\"X2: X-Men United\" (2003)</li><li>\"Fantastic Four\" (2005)</li><li>\"The Wolverine\" (2013)</li><li>\"X-Men: Days of Future Past\" (2014)</li><li>\"Fantastic Four\" (2015)</li><li>\"X-Men: Apocalypse\" (2016)</li></ul><p>Here's a full list of Marvel movies from 20th Century Fox that are still missing from <a href=\"https://disneyplus.bn5x.net/4YYm3\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Disney Plus</a> in the US:</p><ul><li>\"Daredevil\" (2003)</li><li>\"Elektra\" (2005)</li><li>\"X-Men: The Last Stand\" (2006)</li><li>\"Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer\" (2007)</li><li>\"X-Men Origins: Wolverine\" (2009)</li><li>\"X-Men: First Class\" (2011)</li><li>\"Deadpool\" (2016)</li><li>\"Logan\" (2017)</li><li>\"Deadpool 2\" (2018)</li><li>\"Dark Phoenix\" (2019)</li><li>\"The New Mutants\" (2020)</li></ul><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5dc5bb627eece5443d2df8b9\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Monthly Subscription Service (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\t'WandaVision' - Available now\n\t\n\t<iframe width=\"560\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Ywz0neBdJzI\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen></iframe><p>\"<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-watch-wandavision\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">WandaVision</a>\" features Wanda Maximoff aka Scarlet Witch (Elizabeth Olsen) and Vision (Paul Bettany) post \"Avengers: Endgame.\" The two characters find themselves living a seemingly perfect suburban life, but soon begin to question the reality of their idyllic world.&#160;</p><p>Characters like Jimmy Woo (Randall Park) from \"Ant-Man and the Wasp\" and Darcy Lewis (Kat Dennings) from \"Thor: The Dark World\" also make appearances. The show introduces Teyonah Parris as Monica Rambeau, a character that appears in the \"Captain Marvel\" movie series.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5dc5bb627eece5443d2df8b9\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Monthly Subscription Service (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\t'The Falcon and the Winter Soldier'- Available now\n\t\n\t<iframe width=\"560\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/IWBsDaFWyTE\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen></iframe><p>\"<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-watch-the-falcon-and-the-winter-soldier\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">The Falcon and the Winter Soldier</a>\" continues the story from the conclusion of \"Avengers: Endgame,\" in which Captain America gave his shield to Sam Wilson, aka Falcon (Anthony Mackie).</p><p>To protect the captain's legacy, Wilson teams up with Bucky Barnes, a rehabilitated assassin once known as the Winter Solider. Baron Zemo, the villain from \"Captain America: Civil War,\" returns for the six-episode series as well.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5dc5bb627eece5443d2df8b9\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Monthly Subscription Service (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\t'Loki' - June 11, 2021\n\t\n\t<iframe width=\"560\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/nW948Va-l10\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen></iframe><p>In the new \"Loki\" series, Tom Hiddleston returns as the Nordic trickster after stealing an artifact called \"the tesseract\" that enables him to travel through space and time. Not much about the new reality-bending show is known as of yet, but it will feature Owen Wilson as a co-star.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5dc5bb627eece5443d2df8b9\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Monthly Subscription Service (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\t'Black Widow' - July 9\n\t\n\t<iframe width=\"560\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Fp9pNPdNwjI\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen></iframe><p>This adventure starring secret agent Natasha Romanov (Scarlett Johansson) is set before the events of \"Avengers: Endgame\" and explores her origins as a Russian operative working with a secret organization known as The Red Room.</p><p>\"Black Widow\" was originally planned for a summer 2020 release, but the coronavirus pandemic led to more than a year of delays. It will debut in theaters, but will also be available via <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/disney-plus-premiere-access\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Disney Plus Premier Access</a> for $30 the same day it's released on the big screen.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5dc5bb627eece5443d2df8b9\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Monthly Subscription Service (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\t'What If?' - Summer 2021\n\t\n\t<iframe width=\"560\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/4iLVoEg9aLk\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen></iframe><p>\"What If?\" is an animated series based in the Marvel Universe. The show focuses on alternate versions of major events from the MCU, allowing viewers to see how small changes can alter the course of different characters.</p><p>Chadwick Boseman (Black Panther), Josh Brolin (Thanos), Chris Hemsworth (Thor), Mark Ruffalo (the Hulk), Samuel L. Jackson (Nick Fury), and many more lend their voices to the series.&#160;</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5dc5bb627eece5443d2df8b9\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Monthly Subscription Service (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\t'Ms. Marvel' - Late 2021\n\t\n\t<iframe width=\"560\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/TRNI9TtBM5E\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen></iframe><p>\"Ms. Marvel\" is a live-action show following the origin of Muslim superhero Kamala Khan, who first appeared in Marvel comics in 2013. Kamala is an Avengers super-fan and eventually finds herself struggling to control her own superpowers while balancing her teen life in Jersey City.</p><p>Kamala also stars in the \"Marvel's Avengers\" game released in September 2020, and the animated movie \"Marvel Rising: Secret Warriors\" on Disney Plus.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5dc5bb627eece5443d2df8b9\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Monthly Subscription Service (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\t'Hawkeye' - TBA\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5da72883cc4a0a45245a88f2?format=jpeg\" alt=\"hawkeye imdb\" height=\"1000\" width=\"1481\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">IMDb</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>In the \"Hawkeye\" original series,&#160;Clint Barton (Jeremy Renner) will mentor and pass the mantle to another young sharpshooter, Kate Bishop. Actress Hailee Steinfeld, who voiced Gwen Stacy in \"Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse,\" will play Kate.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5dc5bb627eece5443d2df8b9\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Monthly Subscription Service (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\t'She-Hulk' - TBA\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5da729e9cc4a0a474823fcb5?format=jpeg\" alt=\"imdb she hulk\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">IMDb</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>\"She-Hulk\" will focus on Jennifer Walters, a lawyer who happens to be the cousin of the Hulk, aka Bruce Banner (Mark Ruffalo). In the comics, Walters becomes She-Hulk after receiving a blood transfusion from Banner. However, She-Hulk is in much greater control of her personality when she transforms.</p><p>Marvel producer Kevin Feige says the new show will be a 30-minute legal comedy, drawing comparisons to the \"She-Hulk\" comics written by long-time \"Spider-Man\" author Dan Slott and Charles Soule. In those books, She-Hulk worked as a defense attorney in cases involving superpowered people.</p><p>Tatiana Maslany has been cast to play the title role. Maslany is best known for starring in the sci-fi series \"Orphan Black.\"</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5dc5bb627eece5443d2df8b9\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Monthly Subscription Service (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\t'Moon Knight' - TBA\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5da72c36cc4a0a4abf5d1654?format=jpeg\" alt=\"moon knight imdb\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">IMDb</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>\"Moon Knight\" is one of the upcoming Marvel projects we know the least about, though it's been rumored that \"Star Wars\" star Oscar Isaac will play cloaked avenger Mark Specter.</p><p>The \"Moon Knight\" mythos is more complex than most Marvel heroes, with the character's mental health and connection to reality frequently coming into question. We'll have to wait and see which version of the character will be coming to the MCU.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5dc5bb627eece5443d2df8b9\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Monthly Subscription Service (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\t'Armor Wars' - TBA\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fe38b94edf89200180938b5?format=jpeg\" alt=\"armor wars disney plus\" height=\"772\" width=\"1545\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Disney</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Don Cheadle will return to his role as James Rhodes, aka War Machine, in \"Armor Wars.\" Borrowing its name from a major comic book event, \"Armor Wars\" explores what happens when Tony Stark is no longer able to protect the weapons he created from those who would use them to do harm.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5dc5bb627eece5443d2df8b9\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Monthly Subscription Service (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\t'Secret Invasion' - TBA\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fe38bbfedf89200180938b9?format=jpeg\" alt=\"secret invasion marvel disney plus\" height=\"599\" width=\"1198\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Disney</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>\"Secret Invasion\" is a major Marvel comics event that saw multiple heroes replaced by alien impersonators called Skulls. The Marvel Cinematic Universe introduced the Skrulls in \"Captain Marvel\" in 2019, but the MCU version of \"Secret Invasion\" is sure to include a much different set of characters.</p><p>Samuel Jackson will appear as Nick Fury for the first time in an MCU show, while Ben Mendelsohn will appear as his Talos character from \"Captain Marvel\" and \"Spider-Man: Far From Home.\"</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5dc5bb627eece5443d2df8b9\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Monthly Subscription Service (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\t'Ironheart' - TBA\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fe38cada64488001819330d?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Iron Heart MCU Disney Plus\" height=\"678\" width=\"1300\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Disney</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>\"Ironheart\" will star Dominique Thorne as young inventor Riri Williams, who creates a dynamic suit of armor inspired by Tony Stark's Iron Man.</p><p>In the comics, Riri has fought alongside the Avengers and is a member of the teenage superhero team Champions, with Miles Morales and Kamala Khan.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5dc5bb627eece5443d2df8b9\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Monthly Subscription Service (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\t'The Guardians of the Galaxy Holiday Special' - Holiday 2022\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fe390e5edf89200180938d6?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Guardians of the Galaxy Holiday Special\" height=\"791\" width=\"1517\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Disney</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>The cast of \"Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3\" is filming a holiday special on the set of the upcoming movie. The film isn't due out until 2023, but the holiday special is due out in fall 2022.</p><p>James Gunn, writer and director for all three \"Guardians\" films so far, will also be in charge of the holiday special.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5dc5bb627eece5443d2df8b9\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Monthly Subscription Service (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\t'I Am Groot' - TBA\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fe39176a644880018193329?format=jpeg\" alt=\"I Am Groot\" height=\"757\" width=\"1334\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Disney</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>\"I Am Groot\" will be a collection of animated shorts featuring the fan-favorite character from \"Guardians of the Galaxy.\" It's not clear how long or how frequent the shorts will be, but they're said to star Baby Groot and several new characters.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5dc5bb627eece5443d2df8b9\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Monthly Subscription Service (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\t'Marvel Hero Project' - Available now\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5da72a704af9092d671da905?format=jpeg\" alt=\"disney&#43; marvel hero project\" height=\"600\" width=\"800\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Disney&#43;</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>One of the reality programs on Disney Plus is \"Marvel Hero Project,\" which highlights extraordinary kids who have helped their community.</p><p>In each episode, the heroic kids get surprised with the honor of being drawn as superheroes in their very own Marvel comic. The comics will then be available via Marvel Unlimited and the Marvel Digital Comic Store for free.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5dc5bb627eece5443d2df8b9\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Monthly Subscription Service (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\tMarvel TV shows - currently available\n\t<figure>\n\t<img FAQs\n\t\n\t<h3>What is Disney Plus and how much does it cost?</h3><p>Disney Plus is Disney's ad-free streaming service with tons of movies and TV shows from&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/kids-movies-on-disney-plus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\">Disney</a>,&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/pixar-movies-on-disney-plus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\">Pixar</a>, Marvel,&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-watch-star-wars\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\">Star Wars</a>,&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/national-geographic-disney-plus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\">National Geographic</a>, and 20th Century Fox.</p><p>A monthly subscription costs $8 a month, and an annual subscription costs $80 a year. There's also a&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/disney-plus-bundle\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\">$14 bundle with ESPN+ and Hulu</a>.</p><h3>Read everything else you should know about Disney Plus here:</h3><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><ul><li><a and ESPN+ for an extra $6</a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/kids-movies-on-disney-plus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\">All the kids' movies af9093c09474784?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn47@2020_1/2021/04/10/03-46-02-066_7ab7a890840ca275.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn43@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-46-06-040_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=irhlWaIPUMc:qb_rttkvoG0:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn31@2020_4/2021/04/10/03-46-32-945_773157de977dcf2b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=irhlWaIPUMc:qb_rttkvoG0:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn15@2020_2/2021/04/10/03-46-06-754_fc70be0e0b9a6ad8.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn75@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-46-00-486_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=irhlWaIPUMc:qb_rttkvoG0:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn72@2020_3/2021/04/10/03-45-54-159_8ab8aab063379a8b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/irhlWaIPUMc":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn72@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-45-55-788_1b2812d3124a7212.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1618026331881},{"createdTime":"2021-04-10 11:45:31","updatedTime":"2021-04-10 11:45:31","title":"Anti-Defamation league calls on Fox News to fire Tucker Carlson after host embraces white supremacist \"great replacement theory\" on air","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/anti-defamation-league-calls-on-fox-to-fire-tucker-carlson-2021-4","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070eedba451820019b3a699?format=jpeg\" alt=\"tucker carlson rant jill biden\" height=\"1249\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Fox News host Tucker Carlson\n<p class=\"copyright\">Chip Somodevilla/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>ADL CEO Jonathan Greenblatt sent a letter to Fox News CEO Suzanne Scott asking for Tucker Carlson to be fired.</li>\n<li>On Thursday, Carlson openly embraced the white supremacist Great Replacement theory.</li>\n<li>The racist theory alleges that masses of foreigners are invading the US to strip white Americans of political power.</li>\n<li id=\"recirc\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">See more stories on Insider&#39;s business page</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>The Anti-Defamation League has <a href=\"https://www.cnn.com/2021/04/09/media/adl-letter-fox-news-tucker-carlson/index.html\">called</a> for Tucker Carlson to be fired a day after the Fox News host openly embraced the white supremacist Great Replacement conspiracy theory on air.</p><p>&#34;Given his long record of race-baiting, we believe it is time for Carlson to go,&#34; ADL CEO Jonathan Greenblatt said in a letter to Fox News CEO Suzanne Scott.</p><p>On Thursday night, Carlson <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tucker-carlson-endorses-white-supremacist-replacement-conspiracy-theory-2021-4\">alleged</a> that Democrats were &#34;importing a brand new electorate&#34; of &#34;Third World&#34; immigrants to &#34;dilute&#34; the political power of Americans.</p><p>He referenced the replacement theory, a well-known racist philosophy that has inspired <a href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2019/08/07/us/el-paso-shooting-racism.html\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"40\" data-uri=\"95c77dc4563a39699a3155d39284eeb2\">racist violence</a> and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/christchurch-harbored-white-supremacists-before-massacre-2019-3\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"40\" data-uri=\"79160d340ee4fb786b977bade1193606\">mass murder</a> in the US and around the world for years and presumes that white, western populations are facing a demographic ticking clock in multicultural societies.</p><p>A Fox News spokesperson told Insider that Carlson was making an argument about voting rights.</p><p>&#34;I know that the left and all the little gatekeepers on Twitter become literally hysterical if you use the term &#39;replacement,&#39; if you suggest that the Democratic Party is trying to replace the current electorate - the voters now casting ballots - with new people, more obedient voters from the Third World,&#34; Carlson told his audience of millions. &#34;But they become hysterical because that&#39;s what&#39;s happening, actually. Let&#39;s just say it. That&#39;s true.&#34;</p><p>The letter sent by the ADL was first <a href=\"https://www.cnn.com/2021/04/09/media/adl-letter-fox-news-tucker-carlson/index.html\">reported by CNN Business.</a> In it, Greenblatt condemned Carlson&#39;s &#34;open-ended endorsement of white supremacist ideology.&#34;</p><p>&#34;This is not legitimate political discourse,&#34; Greenblatt wrote in the letter to Fox News CEO Suzanne Scott, according to CNN. </p><p>Demonizing immigrants is a recurring theme in Carlson&#39;s show, with the host once <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tucker-carlson-fox-news-loses-advertisers-immigrants-us-dirtier-2018-12\">saying</a> that immigrants make the country &#34;dirtier.&#34;</p><p>In recent years, replacement theory has been referenced at the white supremacist march on Charlottesville in 2017, where extremists shouted slogans like &#34;Jews will not replace us&#34; and killed peaceful protestor Heather Heyer, and the 2019 El Paso Walmart mass shooting, where a white gunman intentionally targeted predominantly Latino victims.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/anti-defamation-league-calls-on-fox-to-fire-tucker-carlson-2021-4'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=Z-7X3OiOZYU:NSqNhy_Gqog:yIl2AUoC8zA\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=Z-7X3OiOZYU:NSqNhy_Gqog:V_sGLiPBpWU\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=Z-7X3OiOZYU:NSqNhy_Gqog:qj6IDK7rITs\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=Z-7X3OiOZYU:NSqNhy_Gqog:gIN9vFwOqvQ\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=Z-7X3OiOZYU:NSqNhy_Gqog:gIN9vFwOqvQ\" border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/Z-7X3OiOZYU\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Sat, 10 Apr 2021 01:36:55 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/607079494943790018bb1a1b?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"4f9c77292529b4d4ef48beb4f5917b81","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn10@2020_1/2021/04/10/03-45-53-705_5b44cf26349baad6.webp","destWidth":910,"destHeight":683,"sourceBytes":25424,"destBytes":25424,"author":"aharoun@businessinsider.com (Azmi Haroun)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/6070eedba451820019b3a699?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn32@2020_3/2021/04/10/03-46-01-741_a21d3c1c0e9c315a.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn43@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-46-06-040_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=Z-7X3OiOZYU:NSqNhy_Gqog:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn4@2020_3/2021/04/10/03-46-04-639_9538f71b6ff33d78.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=Z-7X3OiOZYU:NSqNhy_Gqog:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn3@2020_4/2021/04/10/03-46-05-582_9b3fd7eb31d596de.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn75@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-46-00-486_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=Z-7X3OiOZYU:NSqNhy_Gqog:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn63@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-46-01-438_6026aadf855337cc.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/Z-7X3OiOZYU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn71@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-45-57-239_5861f95c1904af6b.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1618026331658},{"createdTime":"2021-04-10 11:45:31","updatedTime":"2021-04-10 11:45:31","title":"How to check your Apple Pencil battery so you know when to charge it","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-check-apple-pencil-battery","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/606b9b26856cd700198a3472?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Apple Pencil\" height=\"2132\" width=\"4264\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Since the Apple Pencil itself doesn&#39;t display its battery level, you&#39;ll need to use an iPad to check its battery.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Neil Godwin/Future Publishing/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">You can check your Apple Pencil battery in two different ways, depending on whether you have a first or second generation Pencil.</li>\n<li dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">With a second generation Apple Pencil, you&#39;ll need to have Bluetooth turned on to use the magnetic connector option at the top of the iPad - it will also charge this way. </li>\n<li dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">You can check your first generation Apple Pencil battery through the Widgets screen in your iPad&#39;s Notification Center and charge it via its Lightning connector.<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tech-reference\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\" data-uri=\"4c86c1c3a45644bf07d168dc4c802e5e\"></a></li>\n<li dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tech-reference\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\" data-uri=\"4c86c1c3a45644bf07d168dc4c802e5e\">Visit Insider&#39;s Tech Reference library for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>There&#39;s nothing quite so annoying as getting into a flow state, only to have the technology you&#39;re using lose power, bringing everything to a halt. For those who use the Apple Pencil with an iPad, that experience can be all too common since the Pencil itself doesn&#39;t display battery life. </p><p>The good news is if you have a <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fshop%2Fproduct%2FMU8F2AM%2FA%2Fapple-pencil-2nd-generation\" rel=\"nofollow sponsored\">second generation Apple Pencil</a>, the method to check your battery is rather simple, as is the method to charge it. A <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fshop%2Fproduct%2FMK0C2AM%2FA%2Fapple-pencil-1st-generation\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">first generation Apple Pencil</a> requires a different approach, which can be a little more complicated. </p><aside class=\"quick-tip headline-regular\"><p><strong>Quick tip:</strong> The Apple Pencil is designed to last 12 hours of constant use, although if it&#39;s old, the battery duration might be shorter. </p></aside><p>Here&#39;s how to check your Pencil&#39;s battery depending on which version you own: </p><h2>How to check your Apple Pencil Battery</h2><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><h2><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fshop%2Fproduct%2FMU8F2AM%2FA%2Fapple-pencil-2nd-generation\" rel=\"nofollow sponsored\">Second generation</a> </strong></h2><ol><li aria-level=\"1\">Make sure Bluetooth is turned on.</li><li aria-level=\"1\">Place your Apple Pencil to the magnetic connector at the top of your iPad, located on the side with the volume buttons. This will also charge it. <br><br><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/606b9785a7d803001963edcd?format=jpeg\" alt=\"GettyImages 1150666939\" height=\"1341\" width=\"1495\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Only a second generation Apple Pencil can be charged via the magnetic connector option.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Neil Godwin/Future/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li aria-level=\"1\">The battery status will appear for a moment at the top of the screen (if nothing appears, try connecting again, or leave attached for a minute as the battery might be close to zero).</li></ol><p><br>Another way to check is to open the Settings app and click on &#34;Apple Pencil.&#34; You should see the battery level at the top.</p></aside><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><h3><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fshop%2Fproduct%2FMK0C2AM%2FA%2Fapple-pencil-1st-generation\" rel=\"nofollow sponsored\">First generation</a></strong></h3><ol><li aria-level=\"1\">Swipe down from the top bezel of your iPad to access the Notification center.</li><li aria-level=\"1\">Swipe right to view Widgets.</li><li aria-level=\"1\">Tap &#34;Batteries.&#34;<br><br>If you don&#39;t have the Batteries widget on your iPad, you&#39;ll need to enable it. Tap Edit at the bottom of the Widgets section and the Plus icon next to Batteries - it should now be an active widget. You can also check your second generation Pencil this way if you choose. </li></ol><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/606b97d6856cd700198a346f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"GettyImages 617940412\" height=\"1128\" width=\"1493\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>A first generation Apple Pencil is distinguishable by the magnetically attached cap.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Joby Sessions/MacFormat Magazine/Future/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>You can charge a <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fshop%2Fproduct%2FMK0C2AM%2FA%2Fapple-pencil-1st-generation\" rel=\"nofollow sponsored\">first generation Apple Pencil</a> in two ways. First, remove the cap (magnetically attach it next to the iPad&#39;s Home button not to lose it). Plug your Apple Pencil into the Lightning connector or Lightning port on your iPad, or charge with a USB Power Adapter by using the Lightning adaptor your Pencil came with.</p></aside><bi-shortcode from $127 to $1,043 per night.</li>\n<li>Experts say opting for <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/are-hotels-safe-coronavirus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">private over shared amenities may be safest when staying in a hotel</a>.</li>\n</ul><bi-shortcode id=\"table-of-contents-sticky\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-type=\"h2\">Table of Contents: Masthead Sticky</bi-shortcode><p>Pools and hot tubs are practically synonymous with romance and relaxation on vacation, but during COVID-19, like many things, they now require advance planning and foresight.</p><p>And while many hotels offer enhanced safety measures such as reserving advance time slots and limiting admission, there&#39;s nothing quite like having it all to yourself, pandemic or not. After all, a room with a private hot tub conjures up images of the ultimate in romantic luxury. In other words, it might be a good idea to keep this list handy for planning for that next anniversary, birthday, or special occasion. If you do decide to splash out internationally, we also curated a list of the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-affordable-hotels-private-plunge-pools\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">best affordable hotel rooms with private plunge pools</a> around the world.</p><p>In search of <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/safe-vacations-during-covid\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">safer travel during COVID</a>, we rounded up highly-rated hotels across the country where you can soak while socially distancing.</p><aside class=\"quick-tip headline-regular\"><p><strong>The best hotels with hot tubs or jetted tubs were chosen based on the following criteria:</strong></p><ol><li>Every hotel offers bookable rooms with a private tub in the room, typically ensuite or on a balcony.</li><li>These rooms represent a variety of budgets, ranging from $127 for a wallet-friendly romantic getaway to $1,043 per night for an all-inclusive resort.</li><li>We&#39;ve personally stayed at many of these properties, with others ranking high, or recommended by travelers and experts that we know and trust.</li><li>Selections have high marks and numerous positive reviews on trusted traveler sites such as <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Trip Advisor</a>, <a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&awinaffid=257137&clickref=&ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Findex.en-gb.htmlx.en-gb.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Booking.com</a>, and <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.hotels.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\" data-uri=\"ba339a4b9b2bccc4bae955e9e6eb1256\">The best hotels with in-room hot tubs</a></li><li><a data-uri=\"1d113199162010e5a6522ae3fed01bc9\">FAQ: Is it safe to stay in hotels right now?</a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-hotels-hot-tub-in-room#more-private-getaways-14\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\" data-uri=\"4c5d75bc58f9b803de4cfb5a56587357\">More private getaways</a></li></ul><h2>Here are the best US hotels with private hot tubs in the room.</h2>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tNew York - New York Las Vegas Hotel and Casino - Las Vegas, Nevada\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f89c7bed260780019341db7?format=jpeg\" alt=\"NewYorkNewYork_SpaSuite\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">New York - New York</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fnew-york-new-york.en-gb.html%3F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Book New York - New York</a></h3><aside class=\"quick-tip headline-regular\"><p><strong>Category:</strong>&#160;Budget</p><p><strong>Typical starting price: </strong>$40 for a standard room/$127 for a spa suite</p><p><strong>Best for:</strong> Families, first-time visitors</p><p><strong>On-site amenities:&#160;</strong>Casino, New-York themed eateries and shops, roller coaster and amusement attractions, pool</p><p><strong>Pros:</strong> Clover-shaped Spa Suite tubs are huge &#8212; large enough for 3-4 people &#8212; providing ample bang for the buck.&#160;</p><p><strong>Cons:</strong> Rooms are occasionally a bit faded and not always as luxurious as other properties on the Strip</p></aside><p>Located near the beginning of the Las Vegas Strip, the MGM property <a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fnew-york-new-york.en-gb.html%3F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">New York - New York</a> offers guests a Vegas-style bite of the Big Apple. We've stayed here on two occasions and it's a cheerful, family-friendly hotel with a lot to offer those seeking a very affordable experience.</p><p>New York &#8211; New York is located directly across the street from the MGM Grand and next door to Excalibur, with a tram providing easy access to Luxor, Mandalay Bay, the Delano, and the Four Seasons, as well.</p><p>The Spa Suite starts around $125 and includes an enormous in-room jetted tub, positioned in a corner of the room and surrounded by mirrors for a cheeky, quintessential Las Vegas look. The suite is large, with a sitting area, in-room vanity, 42\" plasma flat-screen TV, and a separate shower in the bathroom. Like all MGM Resorts, <a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fnew-york-new-york.en-gb.html%3F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">New York &#8211; New York</a> offers an app allowing guests to book restaurant reservations, skip check-in lines, unlock their room door, and browse recommendations.</p><p>Visitors can ride the Big Apple Coaster, the world's first with a 180-degree \"heartline\" twist and dive, and restaurants include Shake Shack, Starbucks, Tom's Urban, Village Street Eateries, and New York Pizzeria.&#160;</p><p><strong>COVID-19 status and policies available&#160;</strong><a href=\"https://www.mgmresorts.com/en/covid-19/seven-point-safety-plan.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"40\" data-uri=\"d47800a9bc97a0fa7f3ce13dc63375b2\">here</a>.</p>\n\tNobu Hotel Caesars Palace - If Caesars is frenetic and bustling, Nobu Hotel is uber-Zen and quiet, with 182 stylish, Japanese-inspired rooms and suites. We've stayed at this property in the past and recommend it enthusiastically.</p><p>Inspired by Fuji-Hakone National Park, the 1,000 foot Hakone Suite, which starts around $477, is available as a 1- or 2-bedroom set-up and includes a jetted tub as a nod to its namesake city Hakone in Japan, which is known for its hot springs. The suite also offers a living and dining room, a large and airy full bathroom with a separate shower, as well as a half bathroom by the suite's entrance. Guests receive fresh hot tea upon arrival and can choose between scented oils to help with sleep, while in-room dining from <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Restaurant_Review-g45963-d3845751-Reviews-Nobu_Restaurant-Las_Vegas_Nevada.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Nobu</a> is a notable perk. All rooms and suites include free Wi-Fi, a 55-inch flat-screen TV, an iPod docking station, and Natura Bisse toiletries, as well as priority seating at Nobu Restaurant and Lounge.&#160;</p><p>Speaking of <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Restaurant_Review-g45963-d3845751-Reviews-Nobu_Restaurant-Las_Vegas_Nevada.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Nobu</a> &#8212; at 11,200-square-feet, it's the world's largest, with the only teppan tables in the US. Nobu Hotel guests also have access to a private front desk and lounge, the Venus Pool at Caesars Palace, expedited line privilege at OMNIA nightclub, a complimentary Friday social hour, and a dedicated hotel concierge.</p><p><strong>COVID-19 status and policies available <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com/?id=35871X943606&#38;isjs=1&#38;jv=15.1.0-stackpath&#38;sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.businessinsider.com%2Fcheap-hotels-las-vegas%23caesars-palace-las-vegas-8&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.caesars.com%2Fhealth-and-safety&#38;xguid=01DMBET0A3SRVH4NAFZ0SQYSKZ&#38;xs=1&#38;xtz=240&#38;xuuid=ac6436e7f2efbde3ea20d4c32d4cbfa5&#38;xcust=xid%3Afr1617985966890hig&#38;xjsf=other_click__contextmenu%20%5B2%5D\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">here</a>.</strong></p>\n\tThe Samoset - Rockport, Maine\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f89c7369e9fe40019009c89?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Samoset_Hot_Tub_suite\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">The Samoset</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/sid/1617818230670aa40igxrn-xid-fr1617818235223cgf/https://www.kayak.com/Rockport-Hotels-Samoset-Resort-Rockport.5136.ksp\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"20\" data-orig-url=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/sid/1617818230670aa40igxrn/https://www.kayak.com/Rockport-Hotels-Samoset-Resort-Rockport.5136.ksp\" data-ml-id=\"13\" data-ml=\"true\" data-xid=\"fr1617818235223cgf\" data-uri=\"4811a7f051afebfdd6795ae103d21e34\">Book The Samoset</a></h3><aside class=\"quick-tip headline-regular\"><p><strong>Category:</strong> Luxury</p><p><strong>Typical starting price: </strong>$132 for a standard room/$199 for oceanview hot tub suites</p><p><strong>Best for:</strong> Couples, families</p><p><strong>On-site amenities: </strong>18-hole championship golf course, a seaside spa and salon, tennis, basketball, lawn games, zero entry pool, kids club, oceanfront dining</p><p><strong>Pros:</strong> Welcome amenities from local vendors, and spectacular Penobscot Bay views that are best enjoyed from Adirondack chairs on the expansive lawn or around fire pits roasting s'mores</p><p><strong>Cons:</strong> There is still a resort fee despite some amenities and serviced being closed due to COVID</p></aside><p>A historic waterfront resort located on 230 acres overlooking Maine's Penobscot Bay, The Samoset dates back to 1889 and offers elegant accommodations that recall glamorous days gone by.</p><p>There are&#160;178 comfortable and recently-renovated guest rooms and suites, decorated in a preppy, nautical style with shades of blue and cream and lots of natural light. Each room features 50\" HDTVs, iHome radios, Keurig coffee makers, in-room refrigerators, and private balcony or terraces. Then there are the Oceanview Hot Tub Suites, which offer oversized decks complete with whirlpools and privacy shades, all overlooking the bay.</p><p>For a deeper dip, there's also a 200,000-gallon family-friendly \"zero entry\" pool surrounded by fire pits that overlook the water, as well as oceanside dining at La Bella Vita restaurant.</p><p><strong>COVID-19 status and policies available <a href=\"https://www.samosetresort.com/covid/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">here</a>.</strong></p>\n\tLa Quinta Resort and Club, a Waldorf-Astoria Resort - La Quinta, California\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f89c8c49e9fe40019009c95?format=jpeg\" alt=\"La_Quinta_King_Hacienda_Zia\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">La Quinta Resort and Club</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fla-quinta-resort-club.en-gb.html%3F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Book La Quinta Resort and Club</a></h3><aside class=\"quick-tip headline-regular\"><p><strong>Category:</strong> Resort</p><p><strong>Typical starting price: </strong>$217 for a standard casita/$1,300 for King Hacienda Zia</p><p><strong>Best for:</strong> Couples, families, golfers, and sports enthusiasts</p><p><strong>On-site amenities: </strong>41 pools<strong>, </strong>4 private golf courses, tennis and pickleball courts, spa services, outdoor dining, bars</p><p><strong>Pros:</strong> Gorgeous grounds spread across 45 acres, rooms and casitas feature Spanish-style architecture and charm</p><p><strong>Cons:</strong> Pools can be crowded, the expensive daily resort fee covers amenities that are paused due to COVID</p></aside><p>A Waldorf-Astoria resort about half an hour outside of Palm Springs, the <a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fla-quinta-resort-club.en-gb.html%3F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">La Quinta Resort and Club</a> is a nearly 100-year-old family-friendly property known for old Hollywood charm, a whopping 41 pools, and nearly 800 casitas, suites, and villas spread on 45 acres. Outdoor space is plentiful, well-landscaped, and enchanting, making for easier social distancing.</p><p>With casitas arranged around semi-private courtyards, pools are dotted throughout the property. We recently booked <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/la-quinta-resort-hotel-review-palm-springs\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">a mid-tier King Starlight room for $322</a> and were able to upgrade to the 1,970 square foot King Hacienda Zia for $359 more, which <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/la-quinta-resort-hotel-review-palm-springs\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">we reviewed in full</a>. It came with a full-sized private pool <em>and </em>a private hot tub, fire pit, and a large yard. It's important to note that, while affordable upgrades are possible, normally this room costs $1,300 per night.</p><p>There are several other rooms and suites with private pools and hot tubs, too, including the King Hideaway Suite with a private hot tub from $1,136 per night, the King Pueblo Suite with a private pool from $1,420 per night, and the El Presidente suite with both a private pool and hot tub from $1,616 per night.</p><p>On previous trips, however, we've stayed in an entry-level Resort Casita, which is much more affordable starting under $300 per night and located off the resort's 41 small communal pools.&#160;</p><p>Other activities are also plentiful, including tennis, pickleball, bike rentals, and four private golf courses.</p><p><strong>COVID-19 status and policies available <a href=\"https://www.laquintaresort.com/covid-19-playbook/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">here</a>.</strong></p><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/la-quinta-resort-hotel-review-palm-springs\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Read our full hotel review for La Quinta Resort and Club</a></h3>\n\tPocono Palace Resort -
