border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=SLf2qb46DH8:IB9RcK-kKGc:V_sGLiPBpWU\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=SLf2qb46DH8:IB9RcK-kKGc:V_sGLiPBpWU\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=SLf2qb46DH8:IB9RcK-kKGc:qj6IDK7rITs\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=SLf2qb46DH8:IB9RcK-kKGc:gIN9vFwOqvQ\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=SLf2qb46DH8:IB9RcK-kKGc:gIN9vFwOqvQ\" border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/SLf2qb46DH8\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Fri, 09 Apr 2021 19:17:33 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/6070a79d4943790018bb1b64?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"53c598be859c7cb2272fc084a5b930bf","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn87@2020_1/2021/04/10/03-45-53-511_989d5940f10247b7.webp","destWidth":1289,"destHeight":967,"sourceBytes":145488,"destBytes":145488,"author":"insider@insider.com (Stefano D'Urso)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/6070a1c1a451820019b3a57c?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn64@2020_4/2021/04/10/03-45-54-660_8c68765df6239c26.webp","https://i.insider.com/6070a1b0a451820019b3a57b?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn76@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-45-55-768_6960826d54770792.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn43@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-46-06-040_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=SLf2qb46DH8:IB9RcK-kKGc:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn27@2020_1/2021/04/10/03-46-04-002_b8e70a97fff8467f.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=SLf2qb46DH8:IB9RcK-kKGc:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn76@2020_4/2021/04/10/03-46-07-293_a8dab8375014b8a7.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn75@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-46-00-486_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=SLf2qb46DH8:IB9RcK-kKGc:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn75@2020_4/2021/04/10/03-46-03-043_ffcdfb88af518215.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/SLf2qb46DH8":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn83@2020_3/2021/04/10/03-46-08-788_842fdea83df804de.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1618026331890},{"createdTime":"2021-04-10 11:45:31","updatedTime":"2021-04-10 11:45:31","title":"Energy experts predict the newest innovations and challenges ahead for smart cities","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/the-newest-innovations-and-challenges-ahead-for-smart-cities-2021-4","description":"<div class=\"content-header\"><p><a href=\"https://businessinsider.com/tb/the-people-transforming-business-in-2020-9\"><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://media.tbistatic.com/bistudios/_00/dev/ING/story_banners/ING_edit_banner.png?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Transforming Business\" height=\"\" width=\"\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\"></p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></a></p></div><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/606b43eea7d803001963ec12?format=jpeg\" alt=\"GettyImages 1190755236\" height=\"2160\" width=\"2880\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Several cities across Europe are joining the smart city revolution in the fight against climate change.</li>\n<li>The growing collection of renewable energy sources and advanced IoT technology are giving smart cities a tangible future.</li>\n<li>Because of their work, Insider named the top execs at Fortum and Iberdrola to our annual list of the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tb/the-list-of-300-people-transforming-business-in-europe-2020-9\">10 leaders transforming energy in Europe.</a></li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tb/the-people-transforming-business-in-2020-9\"><strong>Visit Insider&#39;s Transforming Business homepage for more stories</strong></a><strong>.</strong></li>\n</ul><p>The events of the last year have highlighted the need for safe, reliable, and healthy environments. In both business and in personal life future-proofing has become more important than ever. </p><p>Many business leaders in the renewable energy sector believe that interconnected data across multiple systems is key to providing a holistic understanding of the spaces we live in. </p><h2><strong>The necessity of the digital twin</strong></h2><p>Technology is enabling this like never before, said Jordi Badosa, research engineer at the Dynamic Meteorology Laboratory (LMD) at École Polytechnique and technical director at the Energy4Climate Centre, Institut Polytechnique de Paris. &#34;The Internet of Things (IoT) is one of the main revolutions happening - objects that measure, monitor, and execute actions, all organized in the so-called digital twin of the building.&#34;</p><p>This digital twin, Badosa said, &#34;allows effective maintenance, health monitoring, and extreme events or alarm detection. In terms of energy, buildings become prosumers (that is, they produce and consume their own energy) and the occupants become &#39;consum&#39;actors.&#39;&#34; Electrical vehicles connected to buildings change the consumption profile and set technical and economic challenges to the grid and the users. &#34; </p><p>There are some exciting developments on the horizon, according to Badosa. &#34;These include buildings that can store the energy in a seasonal time frame (that is, the extra heating from summer to be used to heat in winter, for example) and Vehicule2grid solutions, that is electric vehicles that can also supply electricity to the building, allow to adapt the load curve and potentially reduce peaks and costs,&#34; Badosa said. We&#39;ll also start to see living labs that help to make building occupants aware and informed actors that contribute to the smartness of the building.  </p><p>&#34;Cities produce 70+% of all carbon emissions, so they must be made &#39;smart&#39; by aggregating huge amounts of data from buildings and infrastructure to create Digital Twins - a 3D virtual replica,&#34; explains Michael Jansen, CEO of Cityzenith, a leading digital twin provider in the smart city and energy saving space through its SmartWorldOS™ platform.</p><p>&#34;The digital twin enables minute diagnosis of how a smart city will operate, with real time optimization and automation, plus the ability to run simulations to predict and manage city performance indicators - including carbon emissions and their effect on climate change,&#34; Jansen said. &#34;From there architects, engineers, city planners and building managers can also examine various carbon-related impacts such as traffic patterns, or map the lifecycle of a building from design, cost-saving &#39;right first time&#39; construction and, ultimately, demolition.&#34;</p><h2><strong>Challenges to creating smart cities</strong></h2><p>There are challenges to overcome in transitioning to fully smart cities. &#34;Lack of data formulation and owner reluctance to reveal the carbon footprint of their real estate, hampers the process. Lack of openness from building owners and operators within a city, inaccurate, aging data from aging infrastructure that hinders the ability to optimise and lack of community buy-in are all barriers,&#34;  Jansen said.</p><p>However, smart city projects are driving consultation, awareness and change positively through organizations like <a href=\"https://www.c40.org/\">C40Cities</a>, a group that represents 8% of the world&#39;s people and 25% of its economy, and its steering committee includes major European cities: Copenhagen, London, Milan, and Stockholm.</p><p>There are groundbreaking projects happening all across Europe. The &#34;SmartQuart&#34; project features a complete hydrogen microgrid, funded by the German Federal Ministry of Economics and Technology (BMWi). The project is trialling three different non-fossil-fuel energy systems in three different towns/districts so that they can be compared. The towns will be connected together so that they can trade surplus energy with each other as and when required.</p><p>The Kaisersesch hydrogen grid is where German heating systems manufacturer Viessmann will be testing its condensing boilers for operation with pure hydrogen and also testing the practical operation of hydrogen-compatible fuel cell heating systems. In Bedburg there will be a local district energy system set up using energy generated wind turbine, new solar plants and central and decentralized heat pumps. Solar will also be used to power a district in Essen that will also include charging stations for cars.</p><p>Patrick Doherty, head of emerging verticals at Elavon Europe, said Covid has had a huge impact on how we travel. &#34;With recovery efforts underway, new travel patterns and use of the transport networks will emerge over the coming months,&#34; he said. &#34;In response, transport operators are looking to restore confidence in travel across our cities to ensure its infrastructure is convenient, adaptable, and sustainable for future generations.&#34; </p><p>Energy company <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tb/the-list-of-300-people-transforming-business-in-2020-9/transformers/markus-rauramo\">Fortum</a> is working to enable the cities of Stockholm and Espoo to join the circular economy, launching several projects and investing heavily in sustainable heat production and charging infrastructure for electric vehicles. Spanish giant <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tb/the-list-of-300-people-transforming-business-in-2020-9/transformers/ignacio-gal%C3%A1n\">Iberdrola</a> is investing more than €600m over the next ten years to enable the country&#39;s main urban areas to move towards becoming smart cities.</p><p>Collaborations are essential to making products and systems become a reality, said Christian Engelke, Viessmann&#39;s technical director, &#34;finding the most successful set-ups, especially when it comes to essential infrastructure involves widespread behavioral change.&#34; Viessmann developed its first heat pump around 50 years ago yet the market is not yet at a point where heat pumps are an everyday choice of heat generator: &#34;There is no point in having the perfect product if there is no proof it works, no fuel supply or investment in infrastructure, no skilled people to install and service it, or incentives to bring it to market.&#34;</p><div (Hazel Davis)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://media.tbistatic.com/bistudios/_00/dev/ING/story_banners/ING_edit_banner.png?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn91@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-45-56-617_39f0bb5650c64aec.webp","https://i.insider.com/606b43eea7d803001963ec12?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn55@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-46-01-628_55bf30117bdc8d99.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn43@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-46-06-040_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=mU71lPHg3vk:uyO-Fl_8QzY:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn79@2020_3/2021/04/10/03-46-06-534_479648bfaecf048c.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=mU71lPHg3vk:uyO-Fl_8QzY:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn43@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-46-01-166_dc5b32da62de6ebe.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn75@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-46-00-486_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=mU71lPHg3vk:uyO-Fl_8QzY:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn99@2020_4/2021/04/10/03-46-09-159_5560a39604fa41b6.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/mU71lPHg3vk":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn90@2020_4/2021/04/10/03-46-06-465_e545ad1b4d64094b.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1618026331698},{"createdTime":"2021-04-10 11:45:31","updatedTime":"2021-04-10 11:45:31","title":"How to double space in Microsoft Word on different versions of the word processor","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-double-space-in-word","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070cacda451820019b3a661?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Someone typing Word document\" height=\"1414\" width=\"2121\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>There are several ways to double space in both the newer and older versions of Word.\n<p class=\"copyright\">lechatnoir/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>You can double space in Word for an entire document or selected paragraphs and increase the amount of space between your lines of text.</li>\n<li>To double space in newer versions of Word, click on the Design tab and set your Paragraph Spacing to 2.0. </li>\n<li>In older versions of Word, including Word 2007-2010, you will need to go to the Styles section of the Home tab and in the Formatting menu click Double Space. </li>\n<li id=\"recirc\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tech-reference\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Visit Insider&#39;s Tech Reference library for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>Whether you&#39;ve been asked to double space a Word document or prefer to read double space documents, this formatting can be applied to an entire Word document or selected sections with just a few clicks. </p><p>Double spacing increases the amount of space between lines of text and can be helpful to a teacher or editor in marking the document or adding comments. Double spacing a Word document will differ depending on which version of Word you have. </p><p>Here are the steps for newer versions of Word and for Office 2007-2010.</p><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><h1><strong>How to double space a whole document in Word in newer versions of Office</strong></h1><ol><li>In an open document, click Design. </li><li>Select Paragraph Spacing. </li><li>Now choose Double.<br><br><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070c481a451820019b3a654?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Word 1\" height=\"526\" width=\"1017\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Select Double from the dropdown menu.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Abigail Abesamis Demarest/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li></ol></aside><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><h1><strong>How to double space part of a document in Word in newer versions of Office</strong></h1><ol><li>With your document open on the Home tab, highlight the paragraphs you want to double space. </li><li>Click the arrow in the bottom right corner of the Paragraph box.<br><br><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070c929a451820019b3a65d?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Word 5\" height=\"548\" width=\"1046\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Select the arrow in the bottom corner of the Paragraph box.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Abbey White/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li>In the Line Spacing dropdown, select Double. <br><br><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070c9434943790018bb1c34?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Word 7\" height=\"513\" width=\"411\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Change Multiple to Double in the dropdown.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Abbey White/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li>Click OK.  </li></ol></aside><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><h1><strong>How to double space in Word in Office 2007-2010</strong></h1><ol><li>To double space an entire document, locate the Styles section in the Home tab. </li><li>Right-click Normal. <br><br><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070c8df4943790018bb1c31?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Word 3\" height=\"454\" width=\"833\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Right-click the &#34;Normal&#34; box.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Abbey White/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li>Select Modify. <br><br><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070c8fb4943790018bb1c32?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Word 4\" height=\"178\" width=\"258\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Select Modify from the dropdown menu.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Abbey White/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li>In Formatting, click Double Space.</li><li>Now choose OK.</li></ol></aside><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><h2>How to double space part of a document in Word in Office 2007-2010</h2><ol><li>Highlight the paragraphs you want to double space. </li><li>Click the Line and Paragraph Spacing icon in the Home tab. </li><li>Select 2.0.<br><br><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070c5e1a451820019b3a658?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Word 2\" height=\"563\" width=\"1055\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Select 2.0 from the spacing dropdown.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Abigail Abesamis Demarest/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li></ol></aside><bi-shortcode id=\"related-article-module-end-of-article\" class=\"mceNonEditable\"><a src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=Y8f_TD0Hv2g:y1Df7_oEnkU:V_sGLiPBpWU\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=Y8f_TD0Hv2g:y1Df7_oEnkU:qj6IDK7rITs\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=Y8f_TD0Hv2g:y1Df7_oEnkU:gIN9vFwOqvQ\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=Y8f_TD0Hv2g:y1Df7_oEnkU:gIN9vFwOqvQ\" border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/Y8f_TD0Hv2g\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Fri, 09 Apr 2021 22:21:32 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/6070cb184943790018bb1c3a?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"dea2b445a0ac951fe7468f1b29afd6ca","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn98@2020_4/2021/04/10/03-45-53-566_57011e29383a2562.webp","destWidth":1883,"destHeight":1412,"sourceBytes":104340,"destBytes":104340,"author":"insider@insider.com (Abigail Abesamis Demarest)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/6070cacda451820019b3a661?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn71@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-46-02-810_ce10a30d0cb41d47.webp","https://i.insider.com/6070c481a451820019b3a654?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn99@2020_1/2021/04/10/03-46-02-918_d3b99dd2661563bf.webp","https://i.insider.com/6070c929a451820019b3a65d?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn11@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-46-02-400_7a4dfe2ed3499dc4.webp","https://i.insider.com/6070c9434943790018bb1c34?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn68@2020_3/2021/04/10/03-45-59-381_7612b7e8c3af992b.webp","https://i.insider.com/6070c8df4943790018bb1c31?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn31@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-46-02-558_f7152f13cc7e27ca.webp","https://i.insider.com/6070c8fb4943790018bb1c32?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn76@2020_3/2021/04/10/03-46-03-725_3f89fff5cab5a2ab.webp","https://i.insider.com/6070c5e1a451820019b3a658?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn20@2020_1/2021/04/10/03-46-09-275_92389e894936a6e1.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn43@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-46-06-040_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=Y8f_TD0Hv2g:y1Df7_oEnkU:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn35@2020_4/2021/04/10/03-45-54-125_bd6749ee2af3904c.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=Y8f_TD0Hv2g:y1Df7_oEnkU:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn28@2020_4/2021/04/10/03-46-05-920_bce4f545dd097996.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn75@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-46-00-486_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=Y8f_TD0Hv2g:y1Df7_oEnkU:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn15@2020_3/2021/04/10/03-45-53-462_62598628e26fed2a.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/Y8f_TD0Hv2g":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn24@2020_2/2021/04/10/03-46-02-371_27358e1f237f1fcc.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1618026331686},{"createdTime":"2021-04-10 11:45:31","updatedTime":"2021-04-10 11:45:31","title":"Tucker Carlson embraces white-supremacist 'replacement' conspiracy theory, claiming Democrats are 'importing' immigrants to 'dilute' American voters","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/tucker-carlson-endorses-white-supremacist-replacement-conspiracy-theory-2021-4","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070793d4943790018bb1a1a?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Fox News host Tucker Carlson\" height=\"512\" width=\"1024\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Fox News host Tucker Carlson\n<p class=\"copyright\">Chip Somodevilla/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Fox News host Tucker Carlson endorsed the white supremacist &#34;Great Replacement&#34; theory during his Thursday night program.</li>\n<li>He claimed Democrats are &#34;importing a brand new electorate&#34; of &#34;Third World&#34; immigrants to &#34;dilute&#34; Americans&#39; political power. </li>\n<li>Human rights advocates and other critics denounced Carlson&#39;s comments as an explicit embrace of white nationalism.</li>\n<li id=\"recirc\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">See more stories on Insider&#39;s business page</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>Fox News host Tucker Carlson, one of the most influential voices on the political right, explicitly endorsed the white supremacist &#34;Great Replacement&#34; theory during his Thursday night program.</p><p>Carlson argued that Democratic lawmakers are &#34;importing a brand new electorate&#34; of &#34;Third World&#34; immigrants to &#34;dilute&#34; Americans&#39; political power by adding more voters to the rolls. He described his argument as the so-called replacement theory, which is a core belief of white supremacists that has motivated <a href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2019/08/07/us/el-paso-shooting-racism.html\">racist violence</a> and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/christchurch-harbored-white-supremacists-before-massacre-2019-3\">mass murder</a> in the US and around the world. </p><p>&#34;I know that the left and all the little gatekeepers on Twitter become literally hysterical if you use the term &#39;replacement,&#39; if you suggest that the Democratic Party is trying to replace the current electorate - the voters now casting ballots - with new people, more obedient voters from the Third World,&#34; Carlson told his audience, which is among the largest in cable news. &#34;But they become hysterical because that&#39;s what&#39;s happening, actually. Let&#39;s just say it. That&#39;s true.&#34;</p><p>Carlson argued that his comments aren&#39;t racialized, despite the fact that the vast majority of the conservative voters he&#39;s defending <a href=\"https://www.pewresearch.org/fact-tank/2020/10/26/what-the-2020-electorate-looks-like-by-party-race-and-ethnicity-age-education-and-religion/\">are white</a> and the immigrants he&#39;s demonizing are largely people of color. The Fox host is making his argument in the context of Democratic efforts to create <a href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/live/2021/02/18/us/joe-biden-news\">pathways to citizenship</a> for millions of undocumented immigrants, the <a href=\"https://www.pewresearch.org/fact-tank/2019/06/12/us-unauthorized-immigrant-population-2017/\">majority of whom</a> are from Mexico and Central and South America.</p><p>White nationalists and others on the far-right have long espoused the &#34;Great Replacement&#34; and &#34;white genocide&#34; conspiracy theories to whip up racial resentment. In 2017, neo-Nazis marched in Charlottesville, Virginia, chanting, &#34;Jews will not replace us.&#34; </p><p>&#34;If you change the population, you dilute the political power of the people who live there,&#34; Carlson said on Thursday. &#34;So every time they import a new voter, I&#39;d become disenfranchised as a current voter … Everyone wants to make a racial issue out of it. Oh, white replacement. No. This is a voting rights question. I have less political power because they&#39;re importing a brand new electorate. Why should I sit back and take that?&#34;</p><p>A Fox News spokesperson told Insider that Carlson wasn&#39;t endorsing the &#34;white replacement&#34; theory, but instead making an argument about voting rights. </p><p>Carlson&#39;s comments build on similar anti-immigrant arguments he&#39;s made in the past. He regularly bemoans the country&#39;s<a href=\"https://www.vox.com/2018/3/21/17146866/tucker-carlson-demographics-immigration-fox-news\"> changing racial demographics</a> and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tucker-carlson-says-immigrants-have-plundered-the-us-2019-5\">demonizes</a> immigrants, who <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tucker-carlson-fox-news-loses-advertisers-immigrants-us-dirtier-2018-12\">he says</a> make the US &#34;poor and dirtier and more divided.&#34;</p><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">-nikki mccann ramírez  (@NikkiMcR) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1380309798957285376?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">April 9, 2021</a></blockquote><script async=\"\" src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script><p>Carlson&#39;s &#34;replacement&#34; comments were quickly denounced by human rights advocates and critics. </p><p>The Anti-Defamation League called for Carlson&#39;s resignation or firing. The head of the Jewish rights group, Jonathan Greenblatt, <a href=\"https://twitter.com/JGreenblattADL/status/1380528052061544455\">called the theory</a> &#34;a white supremacist tenet that the white race is in danger by a rising tide of non-whites.&#34;</p><p>&#34;It is antisemitic, racist and toxic. It has informed the ideology of mass shooters in El Paso, Christchurch and Pittsburgh,&#34; he said. &#34;Tucker must go.&#34;</p><p>New York Magazine columnist Jonathan Chait <a href=\"https://nymag.com/intelligencer/2021/04/tucker-carlson-great-replacement-white-supremacist-immigration-fox-news-racism.html\">wrote</a> that Carlson escalated his anti-immigrant argument in a way that purposely appeals to white supremacists. </p><p>&#34;He could simply make standard issue, non-racist arguments for lower levels of legal immigration or perhaps more stringent border security. Instead he actively wants to frame his ideas in terms that appeal to white supremacists,&#34; Chait wrote on Friday. &#34;Carlson has been appealing to them for years with wink-and-nod messages that dovetail with their paranoid themes. Last night his embrace of white supremacy crossed an important and dangerous new threshold.&#34; </p><p>Ben Rhodes, a top adviser to former President Barack Obama, <a href=\"https://twitter.com/brhodes/status/1380370397275717633\">tweeted,</a> &#34;Throughout American history there has been a ceaseless cast of self-involved bigots peddling hate forgotten by time.&#34;</p><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">-Tommy Vietor  (@TVietor08) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1380340003675336706?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">April 9, 2021</a></blockquote><script async=\"\" src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script><p>And Philip Bump, a columnist for The Washington Post, <a href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/2021/04/09/tucker-carlsons-espousal-replacement-theory-is-both-toxic-ahistoric/\">argued</a> that Carlson&#39;s comments are not only dangerous, but &#34;ahistoric.&#34; Carlson, <a href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/2021/04/09/tucker-carlsons-espousal-replacement-theory-is-both-toxic-ahistoric/\">himself the descendent of a Swiss-Italian immigrant</a> who wrote about the pain of anti-immigrant sentiment, falsely assumed that immigrants and their descendants are Democratic voters. The US has a long history of hostility towards non-white immigrants, many of whom, including those of Italian descent, assimilated to American culture as conservative white people. </p><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">-Juliette Kayyem  (@juliettekayyem) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1380541177368342534?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">April 9, 2021</a></blockquote><script async=\"\" src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=KpqRib5XyE4:JmbdYVWbntA:yIl2AUoC8zA\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=KpqRib5XyE4:JmbdYVWbntA:F7zBnMyn0Lo\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=KpqRib5XyE4:JmbdYVWbntA:F7zBnMyn0Lo\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=KpqRib5XyE4:JmbdYVWbntA:V_sGLiPBpWU\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=KpqRib5XyE4:JmbdYVWbntA:V_sGLiPBpWU\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=KpqRib5XyE4:JmbdYVWbntA:qj6IDK7rITs\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=KpqRib5XyE4:JmbdYVWbntA:gIN9vFwOqvQ\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=KpqRib5XyE4:JmbdYVWbntA:gIN9vFwOqvQ\" border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/KpqRib5XyE4\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Fri, 09 Apr 2021 19:17:26 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/607079494943790018bb1a1b?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"1582ec84183d2ce1a2ffc0f8c311f802","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn10@2020_1/2021/04/10/03-45-53-705_5b44cf26349baad6.webp","destWidth":910,"destHeight":683,"sourceBytes":25424,"destBytes":25424,"author":"insider@insider.com (Eliza Relman)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/6070793d4943790018bb1a1a?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn64@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-45-58-211_6685d06712b83fc0.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn43@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-46-06-040_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=KpqRib5XyE4:JmbdYVWbntA:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn22@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-46-07-019_253a54a5970ac54a.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=KpqRib5XyE4:JmbdYVWbntA:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn79@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-45-56-480_3dd70bd567eaf40c.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn75@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-46-00-486_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=KpqRib5XyE4:JmbdYVWbntA:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn4@2020_1/2021/04/10/03-46-03-892_5903183e0fdac58f.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/KpqRib5XyE4":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn24@2020_2/2021/04/10/03-46-04-050_9322d4e19fb2fff7.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1618026331919},{"createdTime":"2021-04-10 11:45:31","updatedTime":"2021-04-10 11:45:31","title":"How to clean your computer screen safely, whether it's glass-coated or an LED/LCD","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-clean-computer-screen","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/606f435f30004b0019b26b43?format=jpeg\" alt=\"cleaning mac computer screen at home\" height=\"1249\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Though it may seem like a straight-forward task, there are a few important things you should know before you clean your computer screen.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Day by Day Photography, Elizabeth Casey/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li aria-level=\"1\">It&#39;s important to clean off your computer screen periodically, but many people don&#39;t know how to properly clean their screens.</li>\n<li aria-level=\"1\">If you don&#39;t clean your screen properly, you could damage it permanently and possibly harm your computer.</li>\n<li aria-level=\"1\">The way you clean your computer screen largely depends on what it&#39;s made of - you have to be more careful with LED/LCD screens than glass-coated ones.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tech-reference\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"><strong>Visit Insider&#39;s Tech Reference library for more stories</strong></a><strong>.</strong></li>\n</ul><p>We&#39;ve all had that moment - you&#39;re sitting at your desk on a normal workday, then the sun starts shining directly on your screen, and you realize you don&#39;t know when you last cleaned it. In fact, it may have been so long that you&#39;ve forgotten how you&#39;re supposed to clean it.</p><p>If this sounds like you, don&#39;t feel too bad - most experts recommend that you should only clean your computer screen every three to six months. So if you&#39;ve waited half a year since the last time you cleaned, it makes sense that you might not remember all the do&#39;s and don&#39;ts of the process.</p><p>Here&#39;s a helpful guide to help you remember exactly how to clean your specific computer screen, whether it&#39;s a <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/mac\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Mac</a> or <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/pc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">PC</a>, including which products you should and shouldn&#39;t use for your specific type of display.</p><h2>What to know before cleaning a computer screen</h2><p>Before you start cleaning your screen, make sure you know what kind of screen you have, and have the proper supplies.</p><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><h3><strong>Glass-coated screens vs. LED/LCD screens</strong></h3><p>Computer screens are not all made the same - and thus they can&#39;t all be cleaned the same way. <br><br></p><ul><li><strong>Glass-coated screens:</strong> The screens you find on most Mac computers are glass-coated. Displays like this are a little less delicate than LED or LCD screens.</li><li><strong>LED/LCD screens:</strong> These screens are mostly found on Windows computers. Unlike glass-coated screens, they&#39;re made up of tiny liquid crystals and can be very easily damaged if you&#39;re not careful. Most touchscreens and matte displays are LED/LCD.</li></ul></aside><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><h3><strong>Supplies you need</strong></h3><p>Make sure you have the proper supplies for your screen before you get started.</p><h3><strong>For any screen:</strong></h3><ul><li aria-level=\"1\">Two microfiber cloths - one that can get wet and one to remain dry.</li><li aria-level=\"1\">A cleaning solution that will work on your specific screen.</li></ul><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/606f40954d3e410018b700db?format=jpeg\" alt=\"cleaning Mac computer screen\" height=\"1667\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>It&#39;s important to use a microfiber cloth and the proper cleaning solution for the kind of screen you have.\n<p class=\"copyright\">d3sign/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><h3><strong>For an LCD/LED screen:</strong></h3><ul><li aria-level=\"1\">You may want to look on your manufacturer&#39;s website and check what kinds of solutions are safe for the screen type you have - factors like whether your screen is matte or a touchscreen may affect this.</li><li aria-level=\"1\">If you don&#39;t want to order a specific cleaning solution, you can make one out of one part white vinegar and one part water.</li></ul><h3><strong><br>For a glass-coated screen:</strong></h3><p>If you have a glass-coated screen on your computer, you have a few more options as to what cleaners you can use, but you should still be careful. You can use one of the solutions listed above, but you can also use:<br><br></p><ul><li aria-level=\"1\">Windex</li><li aria-level=\"1\">Clorox disinfectant</li><li aria-level=\"1\">70% isopropyl alcohol</li><li aria-level=\"1\">A light duster (optional)</li></ul></aside><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><h2><strong>Cleaning tips</strong></h2><p>Before you begin, there are a few more important things to mention that you should and should not do when cleaning your computer screen.<br><br></p><h3><strong>Do:</strong></h3><ul><li aria-level=\"1\">Turn off your computer before cleaning - this is just safe practice where any amount of liquid is involved, but more specifically, any static on the screen could create a shock and damage the internal components.</li><li aria-level=\"1\">Remove any dust on the screen with the dry microfiber cloth or a soft duster.</li><li aria-level=\"1\">Use filtered or distilled water if you need to use it, especially in areas with hard water - minerals like calcium and magnesium in the water you use could also damage your screen.</li><li aria-level=\"1\">Wipe in tight, Z-shaped motions, or directly up and down or side to side. Wiping in circles can create uneven pressure and ultimately lead to screen damage. It&#39;s also more likely to create streaking.<br><br></li></ul><h3><strong>Don&#39;t:<br></strong></h3><ul><li aria-level=\"1\">Use any fabric that feels rough to the touch - even a fabric as soft as a cotton shirt has snags and uneven parts that can damage a computer screen. Microfiber cloths are ideal because the fibers are so tiny that they can cover every inch of the screen with even pressure at the same time, eliminating any opportunity for scratches.</li><li aria-level=\"1\">Use anything containing bleach to clean your screen.</li><li aria-level=\"1\">Spray any cleaning solution directly onto the screen. To avoid any risk of damage from excess moisture, spray the solution directly onto the microfiber cloth instead.</li><li aria-level=\"1\">Apply pressure when you clean the screen. This will likely damage the internal components of the screen and could leave scratches or spots of discoloration or dead pixels that won&#39;t go away.</li><li aria-level=\"1\">Even if you&#39;re working on a particularly stubborn spot, don&#39;t scrub - rather, leave the damp cloth sitting on the screen for several minutes, then try to gently wipe it away again.</li></ul></aside><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><h2><strong>How to clean a computer screen</strong></h2><ol><li aria-level=\"1\">Once you&#39;ve turned off your computer and dusted off the screen, mist a dust-free side of your microfiber cloth with a cleaning solution that is safe for the type of screen you have.<br><br><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/606f416230004b0019b26b34?format=jpeg\" alt=\"cleaning tablet PC computer screen\" height=\"1667\" width=\"2500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Always spray the cleaning solution onto your cloth, never directly onto the screen.\n<p class=\"copyright\">twomeows/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li aria-level=\"1\">Wipe the screen in a consistent, non-circular motion without applying too much pressure. Make sure no moisture accumulates, especially at the corners - if it does, use a dry corner of microfiber cloth to gently wipe it away.</li><li aria-level=\"1\">Allow the screen to air dry.</li><li aria-level=\"1\">If any streaks remain once the screen dries, gently buff them away with the dry cloth.</li></ol></aside><bi-shortcode id=\"related-article-module-end-of-article\" class=\"mceNonEditable\"><a data-type=\"5c6187c22628980ecd397ac7\" data-title=\"How to properly clean an iPad screen without damaging your device\" have green decor flair without an ounce of high maintenance care. If you, like me, frequently <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-houseplants\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">buy plants to liven up your space</a> with the best of intentions, only to have them die a few months later, perhaps it&#39;s time to embrace the faux plant trend.</p><p>I&#39;m now the proud owner of a silk pothos plant and a perfectly styled fake bird of paradise. Thanks to advice from Carlos Franqui, the mind behind <a href=\"https://www.thefloratorium.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Floratorium</a>, which creates stunning large-scale installations often with fake blooms for hotels, restaurants, and boutiques, I looked for silk, real-touch plants and styled them with natural elements.</p><p>Now, I frequently get compliments on my verdant dupes and guests tend to be shocked until they&#39;re right up close when I divulge that my plants are fake. For more information on what to look for when buying fake plants and flowers and how to style them, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-places-to-buy-fake-plants#what-to-consider-when-buying-fake-plants-and-flowers-13\">jump to the bottom of this guide</a>.  </p><p>And if artificial plants conjure up shiny plastic leaves in your mind, think again. Tall Mid-Century Turned Wood Leg Planter Set (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"60708129895a920011ace30e\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Faux Potted Donkey Tail Plant (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\tHome Depot\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f720db674fe5b0018a8dc38?format=jpeg\" alt=\"best places to buy fake plants - home depot\" height=\"1500\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Home Depot</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Sure, Home Depot may be the place you turn to help you grow a real garden for its tools, fertilizer, or even materials to build your own planters. But it can also be the place you go to get a lush indoor oasis without any of that work.&#160;</p><p>Home Depot's artificial plants and flowers include options ranging from fake hedges and single flowers to potted trees and decorative hanging baskets.&#160;</p><p><strong>Price: </strong>Starts at $7.49</p><p><strong>Worth a look:</strong></p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"6070821bfbd3ba0011201a6f\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Bonsai Silk Plant Collection (Set of 3) (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"607083353c5d580011d548ba\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Artificial Arborvitae Tree in Dark Green Round Growers Pot (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"607083d23c5d580011d548c0\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Tradescantia Artificial Plant Real Touch (6-Set) (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\tTarget\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ed809623ad8612bfe522573?format=jpeg\" alt=\"best places to buy fake plants - target\" height=\"912\" width=\"1216\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Target</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Target pairs the lush vibes of fake palm fronds and tropical plants with tasteful, neutral planters for a classic look. They feature plenty of options from potted artificial hyacinth and individual wisteria stems to large-scale banana plants and bamboo trees that are both realistic and long-lasting.&#160;</p><p>Get creative with your stem arrangement and mix varieties, or pick out your own <a href=\"https://goto.target.com/c/196318/81938/2092?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.target.com%2Fc%2Fvases-home-accents-decor%2F-%2FN-5xttr\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">vases</a> and <a href=\"https://goto.target.com/c/196318/81938/2092?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.target.com%2Fc%2Fplanters-lawn-garden-patio%2Findoor%2F-%2FN-5xtpnZ4xvw0%3Ftype%3Dproducts\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">planters</a> to match your tastes.</p><p><strong>Price: </strong>Starts at $5</p><p><strong>Worth a look:</strong></p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"60708b9a3c5d580011d548d5\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Artificial Eucalyptus Plant Arrangement in Pot White (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"60708cbd895a920011ace320\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Artificial Croton Plant (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"60708d70895a920011ace323\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Artificial Potted Fern Palm with Real Touch Leaves (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\tPottery Barn\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ed80563988ee335a57675a3?format=jpeg\" alt=\"best places to buy fake plants - pottery barn\" height=\"533\" width=\"710\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Pottery Barn</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Furniture and home good store Pottery Barn is another excellent place to shop for faux foliage. While the plants and flowers aren't as cheap as some other options, these handcrafted beauties are some of the most real looking imposters available, and many include planters or vases that would look at home at a special event, like a wedding. Just be prepared to spend some money, particularly if you're opting for larger-size plants and trees.&#160;</p><p>Pottery Barn also carries less standard artificial options, like cacti, foxglove, and even potted citrus trees.&#160;</p><p><strong>Price: </strong>Starts at $14.50</p><p><strong>Worth a look:</strong></p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"60708e3afbd3ba0011201a81\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Faux Foxglove Stem (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"607091623c5d580011d548db\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Faux Potted Olive Tree (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"607091e5fbd3ba0011201a87\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Faux Potted Saguaro Cactus (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\tTerrain\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f7222f874fe5b0018a8dca6?format=jpeg\" alt=\"best places to buy fake plants - terrain\" height=\"917\" width=\"1223\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Terrain</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>True to its name, Terrain has a variety of greenery, stems, and bouquets so you can deck out your space with all the faux you want. There are even floral arrangements broken down into specific items so you can purchase them all together and recreate them at home, and wire wreath bases do you can create centerpieces for special occasions.&#160;</p><p><strong>Price: </strong>Starts at $8</p><p><strong>Worth a look:</strong></p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"6070930b895a920011ace33e\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Faux Potted Succulent (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"607093b3895a920011ace344\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Faux Leafy Hanging Plant (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"60709469fbd3ba0011201a8a\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Faux Split Leaf Philodendron Plant (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\tNearly Natural\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ed8f8683f737064f352f11f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Best places to buy fake plants - Nearly Natural\" height=\"768\" width=\"1024\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Nearly Natural</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>As the name implies, Nearly Natural specializes in fake plants that look as natural as possible. Some Nearly Natural branded products can be found at other retailers like Home Depot and Amazon. But for a much larger selection of their plants, flowers, trees, and arrangements, you can buy directly from them. Their artificial faux-liage is crafted from silk for a realistic final product.&#160;&#160;</p><p><strong>Price: </strong>Starts at $36.99</p><p><strong>Worth a look:</strong></p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"607095bf3c5d580011d548de\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Olive Silk Tree (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"6070976a895a920011ace34a\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Artificial Orchid Arrangement in Vase (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"6070a2e6fbd3ba0011201aa2\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Artificial Boston Fern Hanging Basket (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\tArtiplanto\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ed80bd4988ee33a1d12b314?format=jpeg\" alt=\"best places to buy fake plants - artiplanto\" height=\"1056\" width=\"1408\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Artiplanto</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>While you won't find any flowers here, Artiplanto has gorgeous options for artificial potted plants and hanging plants. Even interior designers have been known to turn to them thanks to the chic look of these green decor options. Their elegant woven basket planters are an especially nice touch to liven up the aesthetic of any room, and baskets and planters are sold separately from the plants themselves.&#160;</p><p><strong>Price: </strong>Starts at $18</p><p><strong>Worth a look:</strong></p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"607099613c5d580011d548e4\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Zume Artificial Hanging Plant (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"60709c52895a920011ace34d\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Tera Monstera Artificial Potted Plant (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"60709cc23c5d580011d548f1\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Dayla Artificial Potted Flower Bouquet (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\tAfloral\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f72115d74fe5b0018a8dc4d?format=jpeg\" alt=\"best places to buy fake plants - afloral\" height=\"642\" width=\"857\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Afloral</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>At Afloral, you'll find everything from silk plants to outdoor plants and fig trees, as well as wedding garlands and succulents. They also sell silk flowers, artificial leaves, and live plants, too. Buy just the plants, or opt for plants and flowers that come with decorative planters &#8212; these would especially make for lovely arrangements for weddings or special occasions.&#160;</p><p><strong>Price: </strong>Starts at $4</p><p><strong>Worth a look:</strong></p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"60709d9e895a920011ace350\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Natural Touch Pothos Hanging House Plant (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"60709e05fbd3ba0011201a96\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Real Touch Phalaenopsis Orchids in Cream Green (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"60709e88fbd3ba0011201a99\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Beige Blush Artificial Pampas Grass (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\tIKEA\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5ed803865af6cc1a25009c13?format=jpeg\" alt=\"best places to buy fake plants - ikea\" height=\"768\" width=\"1024\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">IKEA</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>The DIY Swedish furniture giant sells more than just tables and dressers in pieces. Add a touch of nature to your home with the retailer's lifelike artificial flowers and plants. Ikea offers some of the most affordable options out there, with many that include pots and planters still coming in under $10.</p><p><strong>Price: </strong>Starts at $1.99</p><p><strong>Worth a look:</strong></p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"60709f13fbd3ba0011201a9c\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Fejka Indoor/Outdoor Succulent 3 Pack (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"60709f78fbd3ba0011201a9f\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Smycka Ranunculus Artificial Flower (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"60709ff4895a920011ace356\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Fejka Hanging Eucalyptus Plant (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\tWhat to consider when buying fake plants and flowers\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070b7a84943790018bb1bda?format=jpeg\" alt=\"best fake plants what to consider\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Floratorium</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Let's face it &#8212; when fake plants are bad, they're <em>really</em> bad. Carlos Franqui, founder of <a href=\"https://www.thefloratorium.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Floratorium</a>, is a pro when it comes to creating life-like works with faux flowers and plants. He's created jaw-dropping installations for hotels, restaurants, and boutiques, including <a href=\"https://www.marearestaurant.com/new-york\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Marea</a>'s iconic outdoor seating flower tunnel, the wisteria-draped rooftop of the <a href=\"https://www.thebeekman.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Beekman Hotel</a>, vibrant window displays for <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fveronicabeard.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Veronica Beard</a>, plus numerous home decor projects for individual clients.&#160;&#160;</p><p>Here's what Franqui says to keep in mind when considering fake plants and flowers:</p><p><strong>Use:</strong> If your main goal is a beautiful one-day event such as a party or wedding, Franqui recommends going with real blooms since making them last won't be an issue. However, if you want the long-term look of real flowers without the upkeep, then you may want to turn to fake options. For more permanent patio decor, a floral centerpiece you don't want to keep replacing, or a hard-to-reach corner of your home or office that doesn't get much sunlight, fake plants and flowers can be a life-saver.&#160; &#160;</p><p><strong>Color</strong><strong>:</strong> \"It's always important to look at the color of fake flowers to make sure they are as close as possible to mother nature's colors,\" says Franqui. Look for plants that have color variations as opposed to being all one color for a more realistic look. You may even want to compare photos of real plants with fake options side-by-side to ensure they're a close match.</p><p><strong>Material:</strong> Franqui recommends silk as a good option for a realistic look. He also says you should look for \"real touch\" plants and flowers. Real touch flowers and plants are made from a special liquid polymer blend that allows them to more easily take on a life-like shape, color, and feel. Some real touch flowers are made just using the polymer, but some silk flowers can also be coated in it after. Franqui recommends silk real touch plants as the overall best choice.&#160;&#160;</p>\n\tHow to style fake plants and flowers\n\t\n\t<p>\"My trick to make fake plants and flowers look realistic is to incorporate real elements in the design,\" says Franqui. For example, fill a clear vase with fake flowers with real water or use real soil or moss in a planter with a fake tree or plant for a more natural feel.</p><p>Franqui also likes to mix real and fake plants together for the best results. If possible, add a few real twigs or blooms to a faux floral arrangement and use fake plants to enhance indoor or outdoor greenery rather than only using fake options throughout.&#160;</p>\n</div><div 11:45:31","updatedTime":"2021-04-10 11:45:31","title":"How to contact Discord and submit a help or support request as a user or developer","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/discord-support","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070d0e5a451820019b3a671?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Contact Discord\" height=\"1299\" width=\"2309\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>There are several ways you can contact Discord support.\n<p class=\"copyright\">gorodenkoff/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>You can contact Discord support directly using their online forms for users and developers, via Twitter, or by reaching them via email at support@discordapp.com. </li>\n<li>Developers can contact Discord with a specific issue using the Game Dev &#34;Submit a request&#34; feature. </li>\n<li>If you want a quicker resolution, you can try to use Discord&#39;s FAQ help center or community forums to get general support or help from fellow Discord users. </li>\n<li id=\"recirc\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tech-reference\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Visit Insider&#39;s Tech Reference library for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>Discord - the popular group-chatting platform initially designed for gamers - offers users a way to communicate, play games, stream, listen to music, and more. </p><p>With so many users and so many ways to use it, you&#39;re likely to encounter problems on the platform. Regardless of the issue - whether it&#39;s audio and video functionality, your <a href=\"https://discord.com/nitro\">Nitro</a> subscription, or <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-use-discord-on-xbox\">integrating Discord with a game console</a> - contacting the support team is easy.</p><p>You can contact Discord for help and support issues through email at support@discordapp.com, via <a href=\"https://twitter.com/discord\">Twitter</a>, or through various means within their <a href=\"https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us\">help department</a>. </p><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><h2><strong>How to contact Discord support through a request form</strong></h2><p>Submitting a request to Discord can help you with several issues. These include bots used in servers, language translations, payments and billing, refunds, and bugs. </p><p>You should first try emailing Discord at support@discordapp.com before submitting a request form. <br><br></p><ol><li>Open the <a href=\"https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/requests/new\">request form</a>. </li><li>Click on the dropdown menu and select the option from the list that best fits your issue. <br><br><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070d29c4943790018bb1c4c?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Discord_Image6\" height=\"1373\" width=\"1830\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Choose an issue from the dropdown.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Ron Lyons Jr./Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li>Enter your email address, a subject line, and your message. </li><li>If the form has another dropdown menu, further specify the issue you&#39;re contacting Discord about. </li><li>Now click Submit. <br><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070d2e5a451820019b3a678?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Discord_Image7\" height=\"1697\" width=\"2262\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Click the Submit button after you&#39;ve entered your issue in the report form.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Ron Lyons Jr./Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li></ol></aside><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><h2><strong>How to contact Discord support via Twitter</strong></h2><p>Contacting Discord over Twitter will put you in touch with a Discord representative, who will either direct you to an appropriate help page or move your conversations to a DM, where they can provide more detailed assistance. <br><br></p><ol><li>Log in to Twitter. </li><li>Go to <a href=\"https://twitter.com/discord\">Discord&#39;s Twitter</a> page.</li><li>Click the Tweet button and type your issue in the box. </li><li>Click Tweet. <br><br><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070d30ea451820019b3a679?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Discord_Image8\" height=\"1056\" width=\"1204\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>You can reach Discord over Twitter to get support.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Ron Lyons Jr./Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li></ol></aside><h2>How to contact Discord developer support</h2><p>Like Discord users, developers are allowed to send support requests. Their request form is a little broader, and the <a href=\"https://support-dev.discord.com/hc/en-us\">help center</a> isn&#39;t as large, but you can still get answers and related assistance. <br><br></p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070d35c4943790018bb1c4f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Discord_Image11\" height=\"1697\" width=\"2262\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Developers can use their own request form to receive help from Discord.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Ron Lyons Jr./Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>First, go to the <a href=\"https://support-dev.discord.com/hc/en-us/requests/new\">game developers&#39; submission request form</a>. Then provide a description of the problem, how the bug is affecting your program&#39;s function, what the program is intended to do without the bug, and what the outcome is of the program with the bug. </p><p>You must also include the operating system you&#39;re using and the platform that it&#39;s used on.</p><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><h2><strong>How to use Discord&#39;s help center to resolve an issue</strong></h2><p>The help center provides general <a href=\"https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/categories/115000168371\">FAQs</a> for answering questions to users who are unfamiliar with the Discord platform and its features.<br><br></p><ol><li><p>From the categories available on the <a href=\"https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us\">help center</a>, select the one closely related to your issue. <br><br><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070d1cda451820019b3a674?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Discord_Image1\" height=\"1800\" width=\"2400\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Select the issue you want assistance with.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Ron Lyons Jr./Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li><p>Select the most relevant issue from the list of subcategories. <br><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070d1f24943790018bb1c48?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Discord_Image2\" height=\"1446\" width=\"1929\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Select the relevant support issue.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Ron Lyons Jr./Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li><p>Review the relevant article, which provides a visual explanation and step-by-step guide for fixing your problem. <br><br><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070d227a451820019b3a677?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Discord_Image3\" height=\"1681\" width=\"2242\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Follow the steps provided to fix your Discord issue.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Ron Lyons Jr./Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li></ol></aside><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><h2><strong>How to use Discord&#39;s community forums to resolve an issue</strong></h2><p>Discord&#39;s forum section allows users to ask specific questions and get crowd-sourced help from the larger Discord community. <br><br></p><ol><li>Sign in to your Discord account.</li><li>Go to the <a href=\"https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/community/topics\">Discord forum homepage</a>.</li><li>Select a topic or use the search bar in the top-right of the page. <br><br><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070d3874943790018bb1c50?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Discord_Image9\" height=\"1800\" width=\"2880\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Check the community forums to see if your issue as already been addressed.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Ron Lyons Jr./Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li>If you want to make a post of your own, scroll down to the bottom of the page and click on &#34;New Post.&#34;  </li><li>Enter your post title and message. <br><br><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070d3c2a451820019b3a67b?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Discord Support\" height=\"1413\" width=\"1885\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>You create a post in the Community Forum to get help from other Discord users.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Ron Lyons Jr./Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></li><li>Click the Topic dropdown and select the category your issue is most relevant to. </li><li>Click submit. </li></ol></aside><bi-shortcode efforts","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/bernie-sanders-amazon-workers-union-vote-inspires-other-unionization-efforts-2021-4","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/604dea0310c8760018b931c0?format=jpeg\" alt=\"sanders bezos amazon senate budget\" height=\"1000\" width=\"1500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Sen. Bernie Sanders, left, and Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos, right. Getty Images\n<p class=\"copyright\">Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Sen. Bernie Sanders said Amazon workers will inspire other union-organizing efforts.</li>\n<li>Workers at the Bessemer, Alabama, Amazon plant voted the union down 1,798 to 738.</li>\n<li>Sanders has previously criticized Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos for trying to stop unionization efforts.</li>\n<li id=\"recirc\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">See more stories on Insider&#39;s business page</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>Sen. Bernie Sanders applauded Amazon workers at the Bessemer, Alabama, factory for taking on the company, even as <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/amazon-union-vote-why-some-workers-voted-against-unionizing-alabama-2021-3\">a majority of votes were against unionizing</a>. </p><p>&#34;The willingness of Amazon workers in Bessemer to take on the wealthiest man in the world and a powerful company in an anti-union state is an inspiration,&#34; Sanders said on Twitter, in response to news of the failed union attempt. &#34;It takes an enormous amount of courage to stand up and fight back, and they should be applauded.&#34;</p><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">-Bernie Sanders  (@BernieSanders) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1380607178210484238?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">April 9, 2021</a></blockquote><script async=\"\" src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script><p>The intense campaigning from union activists and Amazon ended with a decisive victory for the online retailer, as 1,798 workers voted against the union, and 738 workers voted for it.</p><p>In further tweets, Sanders said he agrees with calls for an investigation into the tactics the company used in its efforts to defeat the organizing attempt.</p><p>&#34;The workers were up against a company that was willing to spend vast sums of money and use every kind of tactic there is to defeat them,&#34; he said.</p><p>&#34;The history of every struggle in this country tells us that we do not always win the first time out,&#34; Sanders added. &#34;But I believe, as a result of their courage, workers in Alabama will inspire significant growth in union organizing efforts around the country.&#34;</p><p><em><strong>Read more: </strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/amazons-return-to-office-policy-raises-concerns-among-employees-2021-4\" data-e2e-name=\"inline-read-more-link\">Amazon employees blast the forced return to offices as unfair, and Facebook and Oracle appear to be trying to poach frustrated remote workers</a></em></p><p>Progressive International, a global organization that backs progressive ideas, said efforts to create an Amazon union, even as it was rejected, &#34;planted powerful seeds to #MakeAmazonPay.&#34;</p><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">-Progressive International  (@ProgIntl) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1380567803841949696?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">April 9, 2021</a></blockquote><script async=\"\" src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script><p>In a statement, <a href=\"https://www.aboutamazon.com/news/workplace/the-election-in-bessemer\">Amazon thanked employees</a> for participating in the election, and said, &#34;There&#39;s been a lot of noise over the past few months, and we&#39;re glad that your collective voices were finally heard.&#34; </p><p>&#34;It&#39;s easy to predict the union will say that Amazon won this election because we intimidated employees, but that&#39;s not true,&#34; the statement read. </p><p>Sanders had been sparring with Amazon in the weeks leading up to the union vote and even <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/bernie-sanders-visiting-amazon-workers-unionizing-alabama-2021-3\">visited workers at the Bessemer, Alabama warehouse</a>. </p><p>Prior to that, the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/bernie-sanders-criticizes-jeff-bezos-net-worth-increase-opposition-amazon-union-2021-3\">Vermont senator criticized Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos</a> for not showing up to a Congressional hearing and said had the executive been present he would have said, &#34;you&#39;re the wealthiest person in the world. Why are you doing everything in your power to stop your workers in Bessemer, Alabama, from joining a union?&#34;</p><p>The company later fired back at the senator, with Amazon Consumer Chief <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/amazon-rips-into-bernie-sanders-ahead-of-major-union-vote-2021-3\">Dave Clark tweeting</a> Sanders &#34;should save his finger wagging lecture until after he actually delivers in his own backyard,&#34; referencing minimum wage legislation.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a season","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-ski-passes","description":"<p class=\"financial-disclaimer\"><i>If you buy through our links, we may earn money from affiliate partners. <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.insider-inc.com/commerce-on-insider-inc/\">Learn more.</a></i></p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/60708cb7a451820019b3a4e3?format=jpeg\" alt=\"best aria-level=\"1\">Single-day lift tickets often exceed $200 at popular resorts, so a season pass can help save money.</li>\n<li aria-level=\"1\">2021-2022 season ski passes are on sale now, and if you buy early you&#39;ll score the best bargains.</li>\n<li aria-level=\"1\">Below, we compare Ikon, Epic, Mountain Collective, and Indy passes to help you choose the right fit.</li>\n</ul><bi-shortcode id=\"table-of-contents-sticky\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-type=\"h2\">Table of Contents: Masthead Sticky</bi-shortcode><p>Spring flowers may be blooming, but don&#39;t forget about winter just yet. Ski passes for the 2021 and 2022 season are now going on sale, and if you act fast and buy early, you can snag the best deals. Plus, with the CDC recently announcing <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/cdc-fully-vaccinated-travelers-can-now-travel-in-the-us-2021-4\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">travel in the US is safe for those who are vaccinated</a>, adventure trips for next season are looking bright. </p><p>Variety is the spice of skiing life, and the <a href=\"https://www.ikonpass.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Ikon</a>, <a href=\"https://www.epicpass.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Epic</a>, <a href=\"https://mountaincollective.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Mountain Collective</a>, and <a href=\"https://www.indyskipass.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Indy</a> passes give skiers and snowboarders a chance to sample an eclectic array of resorts across the US, as well as in Canada, Japan, Chile, Australia, New Zealand, and throughout Europe. </p><p>Which ski pass is the best one for you? That depends where you want to ski, who you plan to ski with, and how often you plan to go. To help you decide, we break down the key details for each ski pass below, including cost, mountains included, early bird deals, COVID-19 policies, and more. Additionally, many ski passes offer special discounts for different age ranges, students, nurses, members of the military, and more, so take a close look at each program&#39;s website for additional details.</p><p>But no matter which kind of pass you choose, one thing&#39;s for certain: You&#39;ll have plenty of new destinations to dream about. After all, it&#39;s a big world, and there&#39;s always snow somewhere.</p><h3>You can see a quick overview of each pass compared here, or read on below for a full breakdown of each pass.</h3><table style=\"border-collapse: collapse; width: 100%; height: 213px;\" border=\"1\"><tbody><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 25%; height: 21px;\"> </td><td style=\"width: 18.2483%; height: 21px;\">Ikon</td><td style=\"width: 18.6307%; height: 21px;\">Epic</td><td style=\"width: 19.3789%; height: 21px;\">Mountain Collective</td><td style=\"width: 18.7421%;\">Indy</td></tr><tr style=\"height: 43px;\"><td style=\"width: 25%; height: 43px;\">Current adult price</td><td style=\"width: 18.2483%;
