height: 21px;\">2</td><td style=\"width: 18.7421%;\">2</td></tr><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 25%; height: 21px;\">Blackout dates</td><td style=\"width: 18.2483%; height: 21px;\">None</td><td style=\"width: 18.6307%; height: 21px;\">None</td><td style=\"width: 19.3789%; height: 21px;\">None</td><td style=\"width: 18.7421%;\">At some resorts</td></tr><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 25%; height: 21px;\">States it&#39;s great for</td><td style=\"width: 18.2483%; height: 21px;\">CO, CA, NM, WY, UT, VT</td><td style=\"width: 18.6307%; height: 21px;\">CO, UT, VT, PA, NY</td><td style=\"width: 19.3789%; height: 21px;\">CO, CA, NM, WY, VT</td><td style=\"width: 18.7421%;\">NH, VT, NY, VA, WV, WI, WA, ID</td></tr></tbody></table><h2>Here are the best ski passes for the 2021-2022 season</h2>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tIkon Pass\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/606de20d30004b0019b2670a?format=jpeg\" alt=\"best ski pass - IKON Pass\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Ikon Pass</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<table style=\"border-collapse: collapse; width: 100%; height: 126px;\" border=\"1\"><tbody><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\"><strong>Resorts included with pass:</strong></td><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\">44</td></tr><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\"><strong>On-sale date:</strong></td><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\">March 11, 2021</td></tr><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\"><strong>Early bird deal:</strong></td><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\">Buy before May 5, 2021 to save up to $100 off</td></tr><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\"><strong>Blackout dates:</strong></td><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\">None</td></tr><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\"><strong>Price (adults, reg.):</strong></td><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\">$999</td></tr><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\"><strong>Access:&#160;</strong></td><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\">Seven-day to unlimited access</td></tr></tbody></table><p>Alterra Mountain Company offers the <a href=\"https://www.ikonpass.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Ikon Pass</a> along with variations including the Ikon Base Pass, and the 4-Day Ikon Session Pass; each with different pricing, mountain access, and blackout dates.&#160;</p><p><strong>Who it's best for:</strong> Ikon is ideal for those who prefer skiing big resorts out West and want more choices for a potentially less crowded experience. Plus, it offers great discounts for young adults under 22, as well as kids.</p><p><strong>Ikon Pass resorts include:</strong> This pass includes 44 resorts throughout North America, Australia, New Zealand, Japan, Chile, and Switzerland. Here's a breakdown of every resort by region.</p><ul><li><strong>USA</strong>: June Mountain, Mammoth Mountain, Big Bear Mountain Resort, Squaw Valley Alpine Meadows, The Summit at Snoqualmie, Mt. Bachelor, Crystal Mountain, Steamboat, Aspen Snowmass, Winter Park Resort, Copper Mountain, Arapahoe Basin Ski Resort, Eldora Mountain Resort, Big Sky Resort, Jackson Hole Mountain Resort, Taos Ski Valley, Deer Valley Resort, Solitude Mountain Resort, Brighton, Alta, Snowbird, Boyne Highlands, Boyne Mountain, Stratton, Killington-Pico, Sugarbush Resort, Snowshoe Mountain, Sunday River, Sugarloaf, Loon Mountain, Windham Mountain</li><li><strong>Canada</strong>: SkiBig3, Revelstoke Mountain Resort, CMH Heli-Skiing and Summer Adventures, Cypress Mountain, Red Mountain, Tremblant, Blue Mountain</li><li><strong>Chile</strong>: Valle Nevado</li><li><strong>Switzerland</strong>: Zermatt Matterhorn</li><li><strong>Australia</strong>: Thredbo, Mount Buller</li><li><strong>New Zealand</strong>: Coronet Peak, The Remarkables, Mt. Hutt</li><li><strong>Japan</strong>: Niseko United</li></ul><p><strong>Perks of buying early:</strong> Current (2020-2021) pass holders can save up to $100 in renewal discounts if they purchase the 21-22 pass before May 5, 2021. Early pass purchase also allows immediate (Spring, 2021) access to Big Bear Mountain Resort and Snowshoe; April 5, 2021, access to Solitude Mountain Resort, Sugarbush, and Tremblant; April 12, 2021, access to Mammoth Mountain, Squaw Valley Alpine Meadows, and Winter Park. Through May 4, you can also purchase two discounted child (age 5-12) passes along with an adult pass. And an Ikon Pass installment payment plan is also offered through May 4.</p><p><strong>Ikon Pass cost</strong>: Adult (23+) $999; Young Adult (12-22) $739; Child (5-12) $319; Age 4 and under $149.</p><p><strong>Discounts</strong>: Ikon offers discounted pass prices for active-duty and retired North American military personnel and their adult dependents, active licensed nurses, and enrolled college students.</p><p><strong>Access</strong>: Seven-day to unlimited access, depending on the resort. Check the <a href=\"https://www.ikonpass.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Ikon Pass website</a> for details.</p><p><strong>COVID-19 credit policy</strong>: <a href=\"https://www.ikonpass.com/en/adventure-assurance-program\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Adventure Assurance</a> is included free with every pass. If, for any reason, the holder of a 2021-2022 pass does not use the pass between the date of purchase and December 9, 2021, the pass holder can choose to receive full credit toward the purchase of a 2022-2023 pass. If any resorts covered by the Ikon Pass are closed due to COVID-19 (minimum closure thresholds apply) between December 18, 2021 and March 6, 2022, pass holders will be issued a proportional credit amount toward the purchase of a 22-23 pass.</p><p><strong>Extras</strong>: Each pass holder gets 10 friends and family lift tickets (25% off window rate) at any <a href=\"https://www.ikonpass.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Ikon Pass</a> destination except Zermatt and CMH Heli-Skiing. However, pass holders do receive early winter booking privileges and 10% off summer reservations at CMH Heli-Skiing and Summer Adventures. There's also an Ikon Pass mobile app that lets pass holders view and manage their pass usage and access destination information. Pass holders also get a free one-year membership in <a href=\"https://protectourwinters.org/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Protect our Winters</a>.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"button\" data-pid=\"606f1efd9761310019cad726\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Pass (button)</bi-shortcode>\n\tEpic Pass\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/606de1eb70954f0019195aae?format=jpeg\" alt=\"best ski pass - epic pass\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Vail Resorts Management Company</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<table style=\"border-collapse: collapse; width: 100%; height: 126px;\" border=\"1\"><tbody><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\"><strong>Resorts included with pass:</strong></td><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\">50</td></tr><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\"><strong>On-sale date:</strong></td><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\">March 23, 2021</td></tr><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\"><strong>Early bird deal:</strong></td><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\">N/A</td></tr><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\"><strong>Blackout dates:</strong></td><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\">None</td></tr><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\"><strong>Price (adults, reg.):</strong></td><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\">$783</td></tr><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\"><strong>Access:&#160;</strong></td><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\">Three-day to unlimited access</td></tr></tbody></table><p>Vail Resorts, which offers the <a href=\"https://www.epicpass.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Epic Pass</a>, has announced a 20% price cut on all of their 2021-2022 ski passes as part of their \"Epic for Everyone\" commitment. Vail's wide-ranging program encompasses the Epic Pass, Epic Local Pass, and Epic Day Pass (one- to seven-day options); plus, a series of regional and specialty passes, including Whistler Blackcomb Unlimited, Summit Value Pass, Tahoe Local Pass, Northeast Pass, and more.&#160;</p><p><strong>Who it's best for:</strong> If your resorts of choice are mostly Vail and you tend to ski more on the East Coast with an occasional trip out West or abroad, Epic is your best bet.</p><p><strong>Epic Pass resorts include</strong>: This pass includes 50 resorts across the US, Canada, Europe, Japan, and Australia. Here's a breakdown of every resort by region:</p><ul><li><strong>USA</strong>: Vail, Beaver Creek, Breckenridge, Keystone, Crested Butte, Telluride, Park City, Snowbasin, Sun Valley, Stevens Pass, Northstar, Kirkwood, Heavenly, Snow Creek, Afton Alps, Wilmot, Hidden Valley, Mad River, Paoli Peaks, Mt. Brighton, Boston Mills, Alpine Valley, Whitetail, Liberty, Roundtop, Jack Frost &#38; Big Boulder, Hunter, Mount Snow, Okemo, Stowe, Wildcat, Attitash, Mount Sunapee, Crotched</li><li><strong>Canada</strong>: Whistler Blackcomb, Kicking Horse, Nakiska, Kimberley, Fernie, Mont Saint-Anne, Stoneham</li><li><strong>Japan</strong>: Rusutsu, Hakuba Valley</li><li><strong>Australia</strong>: Mount Hotham, Falls Creek, Perisher</li><li><strong>France</strong>: Les 3 Vall&#233;es</li><li><strong>Switzerland</strong>: Verbier4Vall&#233;es</li><li><strong>Austria</strong>: Ski Arlberg</li><li><strong>Italy</strong>: Skirama Dolomiti</li></ul><p><strong>Epic Pass cost:</strong> Adults (13 and up) $783; Child (5-12) $399</p><p><strong>Discounts:</strong> A variety of discounted Military, College, Youth, and Senior Epic passes are available. Check the website for details.&#160;</p><p><strong>Access:</strong> Three-day to unlimited access, depending on the resort. Check the <a href=\"https://www.epicpass.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">website for details</a>.</p><p><strong>Refund and COVID-19 credit policy:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.epicpass.com/info/epic-coverage.aspx\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Epic Coverage</a> is included free for pass holders, providing refunds for personal events including mandatory stay-at-home orders, job loss, illness, injury, resort closures due to COVID-19, and more. Unused tickets are fully refundable.&#160;</p><p><strong>Extras</strong>: <a href=\"https://www.epicpass.com/benefits/epic-mountain-rewards.aspx\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Epic Mountain Rewards</a> gives passholders 20% off on-mountain, quick-service food and beverages (up to $150 total purchases per day; doesn't include alcohol), lodging, rentals, group lessons at Ski &#38; Ride School, Epic Mountain Express transport, and more. The <a href=\"https://www.epicpass.com/benefits/epicmix.aspx\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">EpicMix app</a> lets you check mountain updates, make reservations, track your stats, and access interactive maps. Epic Pass holders can also get discounted Buddy Tickets and Ski with a Friend Tickets.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"button\" data-pid=\"606f21283b0eb30019e265b1\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Pass (button)</bi-shortcode>\n\tMountain Collective\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/606de30670954f0019195ab9?format=jpeg\" alt=\"best ski pass - Moutain Collective\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Mountain Collective/Facebook.</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<table style=\"border-collapse: collapse; width: 100%; height: 126px;\" border=\"1\"><tbody><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\"><strong>Resorts included with pass:</strong></td><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\">23</td></tr><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\"><strong>On-sale date:</strong></td><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\">March 16, 2021</td></tr><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\"><strong>Early bird deal:</strong></td><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\">Through late April, receive a bonus third day at any resort</td></tr><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\"><strong>Blackout dates:</strong></td><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\">None</td></tr><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\"><strong>Price (adults, reg.):</strong></td><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\">$499</td></tr><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\"><strong>Access:&#160;</strong></td><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\">Two days at each resort</td></tr></tbody></table><p>The Mountain Collective ski pass is a more affordable alternative for those who hit the slopes less often but still want access to top resorts from Jackson Hole to Aspen. If you buy before the end of April, you'll get extra bang for your buck via a third bonus day at any resort included on the pass.</p><p><strong>Who it's best for:</strong> With its focus on two-day destination access, the Mountain Collective pass is especially good for people who are planning shorter stays at resorts.</p><p><strong>Mountain Collective resorts include:</strong> This pass includes 23 resorts in North America, France, New Zealand, Australia, Chile, and Japan. Here is a breakdown of all resorts by region.</p><ul><li><strong>USA</strong>: Alta, Arapahoe Basin, Aspen Snowmass, Big Sky Resort, Grand Targhee Resort, Jackson Hole Mountain Resort, Mammoth Mountain, Snowbird, Squaw Valley Alpine Meadows, Sugarbush Resort, Sugarloaf, Taos Ski Valley</li><li><strong>Canada</strong>: Banff Sunshine, Lake Louise, Panorama, Revelstoke Mountain Resort, Sun Peaks Resort</li><li><strong>France</strong>: Chamonix Mont-Blanc</li><li><strong>New Zealand</strong>: Coronet Peak and The Remarkables</li><li><strong>Australia</strong>: Mt. Buller, Thredbo Alpine Village</li><li><strong>Japan</strong>: Niseko United</li><li><strong>Chile</strong>: Valle Nevado</li></ul><p><strong>On-sale date:</strong> March 16, 2021</p><p><strong>Perks of buying early:</strong> Any pass purchases made during the initial sale (March 16 - late April) will receive a bonus third day at any resort. Also, buying a pass early will get you the best deal, since pass prices are expected to be going up later in the year.</p><p><strong>Mountain Collective cost: </strong>Adult (19 and up) $499; Teen (13-18) $399; Child (12 and under) $129.</p><p><strong>Access:</strong> Two days at each destination for 46 days total. After using two days, passholders can purchase additional days at 50% off the window rate.</p><p><strong>Refund and COVID-19 credit policy:</strong> A \"no questions asked\" refund policy allows purchasers to receive a full refund before August 31st, 2021. Additionally, 2020-2021 passholders who didn't use their passes (or had limited use) due to COVID-19-related resort closures or capacity restrictions are eligible for partial credit toward a 21-22 pass. Documentation is required.</p><p><strong>Extras:</strong> Special lodging rates (up to 25% off) for pass holders. Blackout dates apply.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"button\" data-pid=\"606f32cd9761310019cad739\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Collective (button)</bi-shortcode>\n\tIndy Pass\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/606dee9b70954f0019195af3?format=jpeg\" alt=\"best ski pass - Indy Pass\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Indy Pass</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<table style=\"border-collapse: collapse; width: 100%; height: 126px;\" border=\"1\"><tbody><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\"><strong>Resorts included with pass:</strong></td><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\">70</td></tr><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\"><strong>On-sale date:</strong></td><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\">June 2021 (date TBD)</td></tr><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\"><strong>Early bird deal:</strong></td><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\">N/A</td></tr><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\"><strong>Blackout dates:</strong></td><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\">Some resorts have blackout dates</td></tr><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\"><strong>Price (adults, reg.):</strong></td><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\">To be announced April 27th</td></tr><tr style=\"height: 21px;\"><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\"><strong>Access:&#160;</strong></td><td style=\"width: 50%; height: 21px;\">Two days at each resort</td></tr></tbody></table><p>If you like exploring independent ski resorts, the <a href=\"https://www.indyskipass.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Indy Pass</a> might be for you. Since it goes on sale later than other passes (in June), some details are yet to be announced. Stay tuned because updates on the 2021-2022 ski season pass will be revealed on April 27. Along with the Indy Pass, there's also an Indy+ Pass with no blackout dates, and a half-price Kids Indy pass for ages 12 and under.&#160;</p><p><strong>Who it's best for:</strong> Those who prefer independent ski resorts</p><p><strong>Indy Pass resorts include:</strong> Approximately 70 independent resorts from Alaska to Maine, plus a few in Canada. New additions expected next season include Jay Peak, Waterville Valley, and Saddleback. We will update this once all resorts for the season have been finalized.</p><p><strong>Blackout dates:</strong> Some resorts have blackout dates. See the <a href=\"https://www.indyskipass.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Indy Pass website for details</a>.&#160;</p><p><strong>Indy Pass cost:</strong> To be announced on April 27th.</p><p><strong>Discounts:</strong> A group discount program offers one free pass for every 10 passes purchased by a single group, club, or team.</p><p><strong>Access:</strong> Two daily lift tickets at each <a href=\"https://www.indyskipass.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Indy Pass</a> resort, plus 25% off the daily rate for a third ticket, and 25% off one blackout day.</p><p><strong>Refund and COVID-19 credit policy:</strong> The <a href=\"https://www.indyskipass.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Indy Pass</a> is nonrefundable and nontransferable. However, there's a \"Get America Skiing Promise\" that gives pass holders who are unable to use their pass at least three days a no-questions-asked 20-80% credit toward a pass for next season. For an extra $20, the Pass Protection Program promises to refund 100% of the purchase price for unused passes. Check the website for possible updates.</p><p><strong>Extras:</strong> Discounts of at least 10% with select lodging partners.</p>\n\tMore Insider Reviews winter gear guides\n\t\n\t<h3><a id=\"table-of-contents-sticky\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-type=\"h2\">Table of Contents: Masthead Sticky</bi-shortcode><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li aria-level=\"1\">Whether you&#39;re caring for someone who&#39;s sick or cleaning your home, disposable gloves add protection.</li>\n<li aria-level=\"1\">Nitrile gloves are especially great because they are stronger than latex, plastic, or vinyl.</li>\n<li aria-level=\"1\">We found the best disposable glove options for food prepping, industrial work, cleaning, and more.</li>\n</ul><p>Though we tend to lean more toward &#34;reusable&#34; than &#34;disposable&#34; these days, having disposable gloves on hand is a safe and recommended practice to follow. The <a href=\"https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/prevent-getting-sick/gloves.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">CDC recommends</a> wearing gloves for cleaning, caring for someone who&#39;s sick, and for manufacturing, public service, and transportation <a href=\"https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/community/workplaces-businesses/specific-industries.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">industries and occupations</a>. And if you do any industrial work where you may encounter potentially hazardous materials, wearing heavy-duty gloves is recommended by <a href=\"https://ehs.stonybrook.edu/programs/laboratory-safety/personal-protective-equipment/gloves.php\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Environmental Health and Safety</a> programs for safety. </p><p>Even just around the house, disposable gloves are great for everything from deep cleaning to handling food for backyard barbecues. We found options from standard nitrile gloves to heavy-duty options. Our picks are also all latex-free to avoid potential allergic reactions.</p><h2>Here are the best disposable gloves of 2021</h2><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li aria-level=\"1\"><strong style=\"color: in bulk: <a charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>These gloves are strong but thin for easy movement.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>The <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B08MLJ85YD/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_040921_best-disposable-gloves-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B08MLJ85YD&#38;linkId=31de474e94af5bca265f8f6fb097c7a6\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Hand E-Touch Disposable Nitrile Gloves</a>&#160;are stronger than other materials, highly stretchable, and reliable for many uses.</h3><p><strong>What we like:</strong> Easy-to-grip tactile fingertips, rip-proof, elegant sky blue design</p><p><strong>Box count:</strong> 100</p><p><a href=\"https://ehs.stonybrook.edu/programs/laboratory-safety/personal-protective-equipment/gloves.php\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Nitrile gloves</a> are one of the best materials for disposable gloves because they protect against most chemicals and infectious agents. The <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B08MLJ85YD/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_040921_best-disposable-gloves-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B08MLJ85YD&#38;linkId=31de474e94af5bca265f8f6fb097c7a6\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Hand E-Touch Disposable Nitrile Gloves</a> allow for precise control with textured tips and can be used for medical situations, cleaning, salon work, food prep, and more. These gloves are a top pick because they are thick enough to provide protection, yet lightweight and stretchy for comfortable wear.&#160;</p>\n\tThe best for food handling\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070a597a451820019b3a59a?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Best disposable gloves - Kleen Chef Disposable Food Handling Long Cuff Poly Gloves\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>These gloves are breathable and easy to see through when handling food.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>The <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B078G6KRZ3/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_040921_best-disposable-gloves-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B078G6KRZ3&#38;linkId=eccec5b9401966af8d5a3ee81cd2048a\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Kleen Chef Disposable Food Handling Long Cuff Poly Gloves</a>&#160;are compliant with FDA standards and are extra long for when you're cleaning uncooked or unwashed foods.</h3><p><strong>What we like:</strong> Ambidextrous hand orientation, durable HDPE material, covers wrists, FDA compliant</p><p><strong>Box count:</strong> 525</p><p>These clear gloves are simple, easy to slip on, and are constructed with high-density polyethylene. The fact that they feature a long cuff design to prevent water from seeping into your sleeves and are compliant with FDA standards make them especially fit for food handling.</p><p>Keep in mind that though <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B078G6KRZ3/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_040921_best-disposable-gloves-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B078G6KRZ3&#38;linkId=eccec5b9401966af8d5a3ee81cd2048a\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Kleen Chef's Disposable Food Handling Long Cuff Poly Gloves</a> serve as a nice barrier to avoid cross-contamination, they aren't a substitute for thorough handwashing before and after food preparation.&#160;</p>\n\tThe best for industrial use\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070a72fa451820019b3a5a2?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Best disposable gloves - Gloveworks Heavy Duty Industrial Nitrile Gloves with Diamond Grip Box\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>These heavy-duty gloves are puncture- and chemical-resistant.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>When working in factories, mechanic workshops, or elsewhere with exposure to hazardous chemicals, the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01G346JJ2/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_040921_best-disposable-gloves-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B01G346JJ2&#38;linkId=b865b8bcb252dc01e49e8430fe6164d9\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Gloveworks Heavy-Duty Industrial Nitrile Gloves with Diamond Grip Box</a>&#160;is essential to keep on hand.</h3><p><strong>What we love:</strong> All-around textured protection, chemical- and puncture-resistant, repel dirt and grime</p><p><strong>Box count:</strong> 100</p><p>When working with high-intensity tools or toxic chemicals, protective gloves are vital to protect against exposure via skin contact. <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01G346JJ2/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_040921_best-disposable-gloves-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B01G346JJ2&#38;linkId=b865b8bcb252dc01e49e8430fe6164d9\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Gloveworks' Heavy-Duty Industrial Nitrile Gloves with Diamond Grip Box</a> is fit for industrial use because of their thick and textured protection that makes for a heavier duty glove that's especially resistant to ripping.</p><p>These gloves also offer good elasticity and are puncture- and chemical-resistant. These high-grade nitrile gloves are especially good for automotive, janitorial, painting, and plumbing uses.&#160;</p>\n\tThe best for household cleaning\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070a8dba451820019b3a5ad?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Best diposable gloves - Mr. Clean Nitrile Solvent Resistant Gloves\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>A beaded cuff ensures these gloves won&#39;t slide down when cleaning.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>When deep cleaning your home, <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00AJY515Q/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_040921_best-disposable-gloves-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B00AJY515Q&#38;linkId=c7e1c696927ba3b78ddf9c3dec85832a\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Mr. Clean's Nitrile Solvent-Resistant Gloves</a>&#160;are specifically designed for hassle-free, protective scrubbing.</h3><p><strong>What we love:</strong> Beaded cuff, great for sensitive skin, solvent-resistant</p><p><strong>Box count:</strong> 40</p><p>Mr. Clean is one of the most well-known faces in the cleaning aisle, but that's not the only reason the brand's <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00AJY515Q/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_040921_best-disposable-gloves-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B00AJY515Q&#38;linkId=c7e1c696927ba3b78ddf9c3dec85832a\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">nitrile solvent-resistant gloves</a> are fit for ridding household messes and grime. True to the name, the gloves are well-designed to block residue from soaking onto your fingers or palms &#8212; a must for when you're ready to tackle kitchen countertops, sink faucets, or wiping down furniture.</p><p>The gloves are also great for sensitive skin and come with a beaded cuff so they stay intact better while cleaning.</p>\n\tThe best on a budget\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070ab68a451820019b3a5bd?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Best disposable gloves - Medpride Medical Vinyl Examination Gloves\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>For basic, single-use gloves, the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07KYV8BHW/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_040921_best-disposable-gloves-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B07KYV8BHW&#38;linkId=33cf15d4b85f4cd9b908857b51bc6650\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Medpride Medical Vinyl Examination Gloves</a> are affordable but effective.</h3><p><strong>What we love:</strong> Thick PVC material, comes in various sizes, ambidextrous hand orientation</p><p><strong>Box count:</strong> 100</p><p>For one-time-use gloves, you may not want to spend much. <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07KYV8BHW/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_040921_best-disposable-gloves-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B07KYV8BHW&#38;linkId=33cf15d4b85f4cd9b908857b51bc6650\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Medpride's Medical Vinyl Examination Gloves</a> are an affordable option that aren't quite as thick as nitrile gloves but are still a step up from cheaply-made plastic gloves prone to tears. They come in small, medium, large, and extra-large size options to ensure a good fit.</p><p>These gloves are fit to be used by medical workers and home or hospice care workers, but they are also an affordable solution if you just want to keep some disposable gloves on hand around the house.&#160;</p>\n\tThe best in bulk\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070ae13a451820019b3a5cb?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Best disposable gloves - Dre Health Powder Free Disposable Gloves\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>With 1,000 gloves per box, these gloves are a good value.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>If you run a business and need a large supply of disposable gloves on hand at all times, the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B08CQCJM63/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_040921_best-disposable-gloves-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B08CQCJM63&#38;linkId=987d950ddd414855b4a293db7685edd1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Dre Health Powder-Free Disposable Gloves</a>&#160;are your best bet.</h3><p><strong>What we love: </strong>Highly stretchable, come in various sizes, huge number of gloves per box</p><p><strong>Box count: </strong>1,000&#160;</p><p><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B08CQCJM63/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipg_040921_best-disposable-gloves-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B08CQCJM63&#38;linkId=987d950ddd414855b4a293db7685edd1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Dre Health's Powder-Free Disposable Gloves</a> are made of a strong nitrile blend that offers good grip and ideal stretch. An especially good option for those who need to supply employees with gloves or who work in an industry where they need constant disposable gloves at the ready, this bulk option offers serious value.</p><p>These gloves can be used for everything from medical exams to gardening and the beaded cuffs prevent them from slipping. They also come in four sizes to ensure a good fit.</p>\n</div><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/best-disposable-gloves'>Business Giardina)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/60709f78a451820019b3a569?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn20@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-45-32-764_be60d7ec0ea82cfe.webp","https://i.insider.com/6070a597a451820019b3a59a?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn36@2020_2/2021/04/10/03-46-01-772_497cf5751b735cad.webp","https://i.insider.com/6070a72fa451820019b3a5a2?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn35@2020_1/2021/04/10/03-46-04-182_194981bd8347737f.webp","https://i.insider.com/6070a8dba451820019b3a5ad?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn39@2020_1/2021/04/10/03-46-04-932_e158f93c340a2b28.webp","https://i.insider.com/6070ab68a451820019b3a5bd?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn51@2020_1/2021/04/10/03-46-00-470_0ceed7d9cbafc1ba.webp","https://i.insider.com/6070ae13a451820019b3a5cb?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn92@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-45-57-359_c04df1c8e58371bd.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn43@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-46-06-040_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=EcWxceciC3E:_zQSSjh4zLw:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn96@2020_4/2021/04/10/03-46-09-416_3c0cec74f1ec4977.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=EcWxceciC3E:_zQSSjh4zLw:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn7@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-45-57-601_8ffdc5238e5ae420.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn75@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-46-00-486_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=EcWxceciC3E:_zQSSjh4zLw:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn63@2020_3/2021/04/10/03-46-05-196_797b62fdceb03ac4.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/EcWxceciC3E":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn11@2020_1/2021/04/10/03-45-58-772_aff76508794d1780.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1618026331657},{"createdTime":"2021-04-10 11:45:31","updatedTime":"2021-04-10 11:45:31","title":"How to watch every 'Harry Potter' movie","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-watch-harry-potter","description":"<p class=\"financial-disclaimer\"><i>If you buy through our links, we may earn money from affiliate partners. <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.insider-inc.com/commerce-on-insider-inc/\">Learn more.</a></i></p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f87189ffd1f49001964d962?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Harry Potter and Hedwig\" height=\"1200\" width=\"1600\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Owls are a key part of &#34;Harry Potter.&#34;\n<p class=\"copyright\">Warner Bros. Pictures</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>The &#34;Harry Potter&#34; movies are now available to stream through the SyFy channel&#39;s on-demand library.</li>\n<li aria-level=\"1\">To access SyFy on-demand you can use a live streaming service like <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.sling.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Sling</a> or <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hulu.com%2Flive-tv\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Hulu + Live TV</a>.</li>\n<li>You can also rent &#34;Harry Potter&#34; movies without a subscription through VOD retailers like<a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/video/storefront/ref=nav_shopall_aiv_vid?&_encoding=UTF8&tag=biip_020121_how-to-watch-harry-potter-20&linkCode=ur2&linkId=f3ba432a6ee8ea9b2c9f4b44cb589a08&camp=1789&creative=9325p=1789&#38;creative=9325\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"> Amazon</a>.</li>\n</ul><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5da63b964af909432430f8b2\" data-purchase-option=\"\">TV (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5e18fba0b2e66a3b703df013\" data-purchase-option=\"\">+ Live TV (small)</bi-shortcode><p>For fans of the &#34;Harry Potter&#34; movie franchise, subscription streaming options are surprisingly hard to track down. </p><p>As recently as August 2020, the series was streaming on <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/hbo-max-streaming-service\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">HBO Max</a>. The franchise then made an appearance on NBC&#39;s <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/peacock-streaming-service\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Peacock</a> in October 2020, but has since left the service. For the time being, you can watch the movies on-demand via the SyFy channel on live streaming platforms like <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.sling.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Sling</a> or <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hulu.com%2Flive-tv\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Hulu + Live TV</a><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-watch-live-tv-on-hulu\"></a>. That said, it&#39;s not clear how long the movies will remain on the network. </p><p>The popular fantasy films take place in the Harry Potter Universe, where wizards and people without magical abilities (muggles) coexist. Throughout the series, viewers follow the protagonist, Harry, and his two friends, Hermione and Ron, as they progress through their formative years at the Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Along the way, Harry meets allies and enemies, hones his magic, and unlocks his destiny. </p><p>If you&#39;re an existing fan or just someone who wants to watch the movies for the first time, we&#39;ve detailed all the &#34;Harry Potter&#34; streaming options below. </p><h2><strong>How to watch every &#39;Harry Potter&#39; movie</strong></h2><p>The &#34;Harry Potter&#34; movies are now available to stream through any service with access to the SyFy channel&#39;s on-demand catalog. That said, the films tend to jump from networks like SyFy to platforms like Peacock and HBO Max on a regular basis. As such, it&#39;s not clear how long you&#39;ll be able watch the movies on SyFy.  </p><p>Live TV streaming services with access to SyFy include <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.sling.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Sling TV</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hulu.com%2Flive-tv\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Hulu + Live TV</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/fubo-tv-price-channels\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Fubo TV</a>, and <a href=\"https://tv.youtube.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">YouTube TV</a>.</p><p>The cheapest of the bunch is Sling TV&#39;s <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.sling.com%2Fservice%2Fsling-blue\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Sling Blue</a> plan at $35 a month. The live TV streaming service offers a total of 44 channels. On-demand titles from select networks are available as well, including the &#34;Harry Potter&#34; movies via SyFy&#39;s on-demand selection. </p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5da63b964af909432430f8b2\" data-purchase-option=\"\">TV (small)</bi-shortcode><p><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hulu.com%2Flive-tv\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Hulu + Live TV</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/fubo-tv-price-channels\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Fubo TV</a>, and <a href=\"https://tv.youtube.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">YouTube TV</a> also offer the &#34;Harry Potter&#34; movies via SyFy&#39;s on-demand library, but they&#39;re more expensive than Sling TV. Plans for each service start at $65 a month, though they all offer more live channels than Sling.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5e18fba0b2e66a3b703df013\" data-purchase-option=\"\">+ Live TV (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5e1f7fd324306a1d0b4da52b\" data-purchase-option=\"\">TV (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5e1f7e01b6d52d1b7108fd25\" data-purchase-option=\"\">TV (small)</bi-shortcode><h2><strong>Are the &#39;Harry Potter&#39; movies on Peacock or HBO Max?</strong></h2><p>The &#34;Harry Potter&#34; films have previously been available on services like <a href=\"https://trk.hbomax.com/aff_c?offer_id=5&aff_id=10121012\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">HBO Max</a> and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.peacocktv.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Peacock</a>, but the movies are not currently streaming on either of those platforms.</p><p>Due to existing streaming deals, <a href=\"https://www.vulture.com/2020/08/harry-potter-movies-streaming-online-peacock.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Vulture</a> suggests that the &#34;Harry Potter&#34; movies may alternate between <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.peacocktv.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Peacock</a> and<a href=\"https://trk.hbomax.com/aff_c?offer_id=5&aff_id=10121012\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"> HBO Max</a> regularly through 2025. As of April 2021, it&#39;s unclear when the movies will be back on either service. </p><h2><strong>How to rent &#39;Harry Potter&#39; movies</strong></h2><p>In addition to live TV streaming services, fans can also rent or buy every &#34;Harry Potter&#34; film on a per-movie-basis through digital rental services. Some of these services include <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/video/storefront/ref=nav_shopall_aiv_vid?&_encoding=UTF8&tag=biip_020121_how-to-watch-harry-potter-20&linkCode=ur2&linkId=f3ba432a6ee8ea9b2c9f4b44cb589a08&camp=1789&creative=9325p=1789&#38;creative=9325\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Amazon</a>, <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.redbox.com%2FprivacyFprivacy\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">RedBox</a>, <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.fandangonow.com%2Fw.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">FandangoNow</a>, <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.vudu.com%2Fu.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Vudu</a>,<a href=\"https://play.google.com/store/movies\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"> Google Play</a>, and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fitunes%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">iTunes</a>.</p><p>Pricing for the series varies by service, but most of the movies start at $4 to rent or $15 to buy.</p><p>For those unfamiliar with digital rental services, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-rent-movies-online\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">check out our guide on how to rent movies online</a>. </p><div border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/h9ccfWcFBUE\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Fri, 09 Apr 2021 20:58:50 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/6018634a6dfbe10018e0122f?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"f04d70dda2865f49dbffbe6c1c57b8bd","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn65@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-45-53-751_538a65d3a45f421c.webp","destWidth":1600,"destHeight":1200,"sourceBytes":33044,"destBytes":33044,"author":"insider@insider.com (Ben Blanchet,Andrew Severin)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f87189ffd1f49001964d962?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn36@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-46-04-934_0198cc34b2795cbc.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn43@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-46-06-040_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=h9ccfWcFBUE:GI3JRYpet9Y:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn83@2020_4/2021/04/10/03-45-54-219_59a5157e5563153d.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=h9ccfWcFBUE:GI3JRYpet9Y:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn84@2020_1/2021/04/10/03-45-55-018_f218f69a1fc9ed5c.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn75@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-46-00-486_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=h9ccfWcFBUE:GI3JRYpet9Y:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn40@2020_1/2021/04/10/03-45-55-114_cf4b3935d9ecfb2c.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/h9ccfWcFBUE":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn56@2020_2/2021/04/10/03-46-06-195_1b74df04f5fef938.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1618026331694},{"createdTime":"2021-04-10 11:45:31","updatedTime":"2021-04-10 11:45:31","title":"What is Hoopla? How the cloud-based service uses your library membership to give you books, music, and movies","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-is-hoopla","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/60704aca4d3e410018b702fe?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Man reading eBook in library\" height=\"1403\" width=\"1870\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Hoopla is a cloud-based digital library service that offers streaming movies and TV shows, music, and audiobooks.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Nastasic/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Hoopla is a cloud-based digital library service that offers streaming movies and TV shows, music, and audiobooks to people with a public library membership.</li>\n<li>Hoopla provides around 250,000 albums and 10,000 TV shows, movies, and audiobooks, with more being added regularly. </li>\n<li>The Hoopla service is only available to public library users in cities that sign up for it and may impose limits on how much you can borrow.</li>\n<li id=\"recirc\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tech-reference\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Visit Insider&#39;s Tech Reference library for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>More and more public libraries are opting into digital systems that offer members the ability to read, watch, and listen to media from the comfort of their own homes or devices - and for a good reason. </p><p>With <a href=\"https://www.pewresearch.org/internet/2016/09/09/library-usage-and-engagement/\">physical library usage trending downwards</a> over the past decade and tech use up, having a way to get books, research materials, and other media you typically find at your local branch into your hands quickly and easily can reduce personal costs, frustration, and shipping waste. </p><p>Hoopla, a cloud-based digital library service, aims to do just that. </p><h2>What is Hoopla?</h2><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/607048f330004b0019b26d25?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Hoopla 1\" height=\"1414\" width=\"1784\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Hoopla users have a customized dashboard of previous and recommended watches.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Abbey White/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>Similar to Zinio and IndieFlix, the Hoopla platform links with public library systems across the US and Canada that opt into it. That association, following Hoopla&#39;s launch, has allowed members to <a href=\"https://www.thestar.com/life/technology/2014/04/07/toronto_public_library_launches_hoopla_netflixlike_movie_and_music_service.html\">stream around 250,000 albums and 10,000 videos</a> on demand when they finish signing up. </p><aside class=\"quick-tip headline-regular\"><p><strong>Quick tip: </strong>Because libraries that opt-in to the Hoopla service have to pay per title, many libraries limit how much you can borrow every month. </p></aside><p>You&#39;ll need to register for a Hoopla account via the <a href=\"https://www.hoopladigital.com/\">Hoopla Digital website</a>, entering your login information, your local library, and your membership number. Once your registration is complete, you can immediately begin borrowing. </p><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><h3><strong>What you need to sign up for Hoopla </strong></h3><p>Before you begin using Hoopla, you&#39;ll need to sign-up. Here&#39;s what you should have ready. <br><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070479d30004b0019b26d1d?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Hoopla 4\" height=\"1414\" width=\"1865\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Hoopla will attempt to connect you to participating libraries in your area.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Abbey White/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul><li aria-level=\"1\">A membership card from a Hoopla-associated library</li><li aria-level=\"1\">An email address and password </li><li aria-level=\"1\">A computer, tablet, smartphone, or another device with streaming capabilities </li><li aria-level=\"1\">The Hoopla Digital app, where applicable </li></ul></aside><aside class=\"quick-tip headline-regular\"><p><strong>Important:</strong> Hoopla is only available on iOS, Android, Amazon Fire TV, Apple TV, Roku, Chromecast, and the web. </p></aside><h2>How to borrow from Hoopla</h2><p>How many electronic items you&#39;re allowed to check out every month depends on your specific library&#39;s policies. While there are no late fees, each of your items will have an expiration date and be automatically returned once that date passes. </p><p>At the current time, Audiobooks and eBooks are rented for 21 days, while music has a 7-day rental period and movies and TV shows are available for 72 hours from the time of renting. You can renew a rental up to two days before the current period ends, but it will count as a new rental and be subtracted from your monthly allowance. </p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/607047f530004b0019b26d21?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Hoopla 3\" height=\"1414\" width=\"1910\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Select the available title you want and then click Borrow to begin the lending process.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Abbey White/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p> Account-holders can use tools like Kids Mode - which restricts browse and search results to kid-appropriate content - and Auto Lend Holds, which lets Hoopla check out titles for you automatically after held titles become available, to automate and improve their selection.</p><p>But Hoopla doesn&#39;t have waitlists, and there&#39;s no limit on how many users can &#34;check out&#34; a specific title at any given time.</p><h2>What you should know before you use the Hoopla service</h2><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070483a30004b0019b26d22?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Hoopla 2\" height=\"1430\" width=\"1862\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Hoopla has a large number of titles across formats, but there are some restrictions.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Abbey White/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>It&#39;s certainly convenient for those who want to consume media on the go, but Hoopla does have limitations. </p><p>The service shouldn&#39;t be considered a replacement for traditional libraries. While its offerings are extensive, they&#39;re by no means complete and may not represent what&#39;s physically available at your local branch. </p><p>Though offline access to material is possible, the number of compatible devices is short of extensive. Moreover, not every library has opted-in to the service, so many library cardholders won&#39;t get access.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"related-article-module-end-of-article\" class=\"mceNonEditable\"><a data-type=\"5fd1530c6bba7935e3799bbf\" data-title=\"How to get library books on your Kindle for free and borrow the latest titles\" data-url=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-get-library-books-on-your-kindle\" data-vertical=\"sai\" data-image=\"https://i.insider.com/5fd286fa2dc42e0018f0e474\">How to get library books on your Kindle for free and borrow the latest titles</a><a data-type=\"5ede804f4dca6812d77ff015\" data-title=\"5 ways to get free books on your Kindle, from classics to new releases\" office","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-active-seating","description":"<bi-shortcode id=\"table-of-contents-sticky\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-type=\"h2\">Table of Contents: Masthead Sticky</bi-shortcode><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li><strong>Active seating encourages you to move more than a traditional chair. </strong></li>\n<li><strong>There are many styles, including those that work with a traditional, standing, or adjustable desk.</strong></li>\n<li aria-level=\"1\"><strong>Of all the options we researched and tested, the</strong><a href=\"https://amzn.to/2WvVDzM\"> <strong>Varier Move Stool</strong></a><strong> is the best for most people.</strong></li>\n</ul><p>Prolonged periods of sitting, including those during work hours, may raise the risk of heart disease, <a href=\"https://www.heart.org/en/news/2018/05/01/sitting-too-much-may-raise-heart-disease-risk\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">according to the American Heart Association</a>. Many <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-standing-desk\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">experts agree</a> that <a href=\"https://uwaterloo.ca/news/how-long-should-you-stand-rather-sit-your-work-station\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">a mix of sitting and standing</a> can balance the benefits and drawbacks of both. Active seating may also provide some additional movement you might not get from a standard office chair. </p><p>Active seating promotes movement, encourages good posture, and engages your core while sitting. Some models can work with a standing desk, so you can transition between sitting and standing throughout the day. </p><p>We combined testing and research to find active seating options for a variety of body types, work setups, and budgets. </p><h2>Here are the best active seating options:</h2><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><strong>Best active seating overall: <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B06XXL9ZG8/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biipgf_112017_best-active-seating-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B06XXL9ZG8&linkId=2bf0558b47ca6fc33fd4d0c701cff7d347ca6fc33fd4d0c701cff7d3\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Varier Move Stool</a></strong></li><li><strong>Best active seating for a standing desk: <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B015TOI2TM/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biipgf_112017_best-active-seating-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B015TOI2TM&linkId=62063e1a51cb408a72f297a42088022851cb408a72f297a420880228\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Focal Locus Leaning Seat</a></strong></li><li><strong>Best active seating on a budget: <a href=\"https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=35871X943606&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gaiam.com%2Fcollections%2Factive-sitting%2Fproducts%2Fclassic-balance-ball-chair%3Fvariant%3D329365921292129\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Gaiam Balance Ball Chair</a></strong></li><li><strong>Best active seating for back pain: <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B06XXP15CW/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biipgf_112017_best-active-seating-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B06XXP15CW&linkId=3f8451b8935d6a297f20089f72a5bd88935d6a297f20089f72a5bd88\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Varier Variable Balans Kneeling Chair</a></strong></li></ul><aside class=\"quick-tip headline-regular\"><p><strong>Updated on 04/09/2021: </strong>We&#39;re continuing to research and test active seating options. One of our past picks, the<a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01I2N71Z8/ref=as_li_tl?ots=1&slotNum=33&imprToken=e6bc4732-adf5-d636-a21&ie=UTF8&tag=biipgf_112017_best-active-seating-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B01I2N71Z8&linkId=eaa98bd3fb21e677f4bc7a84d84c62cckId=eaa98bd3fb21e677f4bc7a84d84c62cc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"> Focal Mogo Seat</a>, has been discontinued. While these are our top picks right now, we are still doing long-term testing for durability.</p></aside>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tThe best overall\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5a0f0cf03dbef425008b6bee?format=jpeg\" alt=\"best active seating Varier move stool\" height=\"0\" width=\"0\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Varier</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>The <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B06XXL9ZG8/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_112017_best-active-seating-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B06XXL9ZG8&#38;linkId=2bf0558b47ca6fc33fd4d0c701cff7d3\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow sponsored\">Varier Move Stool</a> <strong>is easy to assemble and adjustable so it will work with both traditional and standing desks.</strong></h3><p><strong>Pros: </strong>Cushioned for added comfort, allows you to sit up straight, rounded base and 360 degrees of rotation for mobility, lightweight and height adjustable, compatible with standing desks</p><p><strong>Cons: </strong>On the expensive side, saddle-style seat makes it tricky to wear a skirt or dress</p><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><ul><li><strong>Height range: </strong>Up to 6'5\"<strong><br /></strong></li><li><strong>Weight limit: </strong>250 pounds</li><li><strong>Height adjustability:</strong> 22 to 32.25 inches</li><li><strong>Dimensions (LWH): </strong>17.6 x 16.1 x 9.4 inches</li><li><strong>Weight: </strong>15.5 pounds</li></ul></aside><p>I tested the<a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B06XXL9ZG8/ref=as_li_tl?ots=1&#38;slotNum=30&#38;imprToken=e6bc4732-adf5-d636-a21&#38;ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_112017_best-active-seating-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B06XXL9ZG8&#38;linkId=2bf0558b47ca6fc33fd4d0c701cff7d3\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"> Varier Move</a> and can confidently say I felt an immediate improvement in my posture. While it did take some time to adjust to and I still had to remind myself to sit up straighter at times, my back felt a lot better after using the stool. The lightly curved base also allowed me a good deal of mobility but was sturdy enough that I never felt like I was going to tip over on it.</p><p>The Varier Move is<a href=\"https://newsnetwork.mayoclinic.org/discussion/mayo-clinic-announces-neat-product-certification/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"> NEAT (Non-Exercise Activity Thermogenesis) certified</a> by the Mayo Clinic, which means it will allow you to burn more calories even while sitting. While this is by no means a total replacement for getting up and walking around, it's far better than sitting hunched over in your traditional desk chair.</p><p>The top of the stool is reminiscent of a bike seat, although a much larger and more cushioned one. You sit with your feet planted and your legs splayed slightly open, which in turn opens your hips and keeps your core and your leg muscles engaged. While this style of sitting is amazing for the posture, I wouldn't advise wearing a shorter dress or skirt while using this.&#160;</p><p>It's height adjustable with a range of, allowing it to be compatible with both a traditional and standing desk. The rounded bottom allows you to tilt and balance at all angles, and you can rotate a full 360 degrees.</p><p>The only true downside I could see with the Varier Move is the price. This is not something I would call budget-friendly. However, if you suffer from back pain or just want to find a way to be more active while tethered to your desk, I found the Varier Move Stool to be the winning option that truly works.</p>\n\tThe best for a standing desk\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5a0f0ddaf914c329008b49d1?format=jpeg\" alt=\"best active seating focal upright Locus Leaning\" height=\"0\" width=\"0\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Focal Upright</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><strong>If you're looking for an alternative to standing all day, the</strong><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B015TOI2TM/ref=as_li_tl?ots=1&#38;slotNum=37&#38;imprToken=e6bc4732-adf5-d636-a21&#38;ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_112017_best-active-seating-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B015TOI2TM&#38;linkId=62063e1a51cb408a72f297a420880228\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"> <strong>Locus Leaning seat</strong></a><strong> from Focal will give you a place to rest.</strong></h3><p><strong>Pros: </strong>Promotes good posture, high-quality design, works well with a standing desk</p><p><strong>Cons: </strong>Expensive, takes up more space than many alternatives</p><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><ul><li><strong>Height range:</strong> 4' 11\" to 6' 10\"</li><li><strong>Weight limit: </strong>300 pounds</li><li><strong>Height adjustability: </strong>31 to 41 inches</li><li><strong>Dimensions (LWH):</strong> 45 x 25.5 x 41 inches</li><li><strong>Weight: </strong>32 pounds</li></ul></aside><p>As its name states, the<a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B015TOI2TM/ref=as_li_tl?ots=1&#38;slotNum=38&#38;imprToken=e6bc4732-adf5-d636-a21&#38;ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_112017_best-active-seating-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B015TOI2TM&#38;linkId=62063e1a51cb408a72f297a420880228\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"> Focal Locus</a> is a leaning style of active seating, the middle ground between sitting and standing. It allows you to take a rest from standing all day but keeps you more mobile than a traditional office chair.</p><p>The leaning angle promotes hip opening, which in turn puts less pressure on your spine. The Locus comes with a footboard, which puts your feet and ankles at a more comfortable angle as you lean, preventing you from putting any extra strain on those muscles. The only downside of the footboard is that it does take up a good amount of space. There are rollers to make it easy to move around, and it will also fold to make storage slightly easier.&#160;</p><p>The seat itself is a saddle-style, which pushes your pelvis forward so your spine aligns and removes pressure from the lumbar vertebrae. It's also lightly padded and designed to help reduce pressure points that are normally pinched in a traditional office chair. The Locus is also height adjustable.&#160;</p><p>The Locus will need to be put together, but expert assembly is also available if you're the type that cringes at the words \"assembly required.\"</p><p>The Locus is one of the most expensive active seating options on the market, but in this case, you will get what you pay for. It's a sturdy, well-designed, and high-quality active seating option.</p>\n\tThe best on a budget\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5a0f0e1c3dbef4a7748b6544?format=jpeg\" alt=\"best active seating Gaiam Balance Ball Chair\" height=\"0\" width=\"0\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Gaiam</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><strong>The</strong><a href=\"https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=35871X943606&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gaiam.com%2Fcollections%2Factive-sitting%2Fproducts%2Fclassic-balance-ball-chair%3Fvariant%3D32936592129&#38;xcust=1617296708223a8l0z3g7n%7Cxid:fr1617296718710hei\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"> <strong>Gaiam Balance Ball Chair</strong></a><strong> is an affordable option that will engage your core muscles and improve your posture.</strong></h3><p><strong>Pros: </strong>Improves your posture, works your core muscles, affordable, ball provides a cushioned seat</p><p><strong>Cons: </strong>Won't work with a standing desk, can be easier to slouch with this style of active seating</p><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><ul><li><strong>Height range:</strong> 5'0\" to 5'11\"</li><li><strong>Weight limit: </strong>300 pounds</li><li><strong>Dimensions (LWH):</strong> 22 x 22 x 31 inches&#160;</li><li><strong>Weight: </strong>13 pounds</li></ul></aside><p>While you could use a stability ball by itself as an alternative office chair, there is always the danger of losing your balance. The <a href=\"https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=35871X943606&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gaiam.com%2Fcollections%2Factive-sitting%2Fproducts%2Fclassic-balance-ball-chair%3Fvariant%3D32936592129&#38;xcust=1617296708223a6kes04sz%7Cxid:fr1617296718710afg\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Gaiam Balance Ball</a> sits in a chair frame with additional back support. It comes at a relatively affordable price, especially when compared to other active seating models on the market.</p><p>While it can be easier to slouch in this style of active seating, the backrest can help. A metal bar across the front keeps the ball securely in place, and the four casters on the bottom allow you to move the chair. These can also be locked in place for extra stability when you need it.</p><p>Unfortunately, this chair won't work with a standing desk, and its height adjustability relies upon the level of inflation. However, it is designed to fit most standard-height desks.</p><p>If you're looking for a more cushioned seat, this is also a great option. While the ball encourages you to work your core muscles and improve your posture, its material and bounce make for a very comfortable seat. Some basic assembly is required with this chair, but it does come with an air pump so you can inflate the exercise ball and start using your chair right away. Gaiam also gives you multiple colors to choose from, so you can add a pop of color to your space if you so desire.</p><p>Despite some of its shortcomings, the affordability of the <a href=\"https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=35871X943606&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gaiam.com%2Fcollections%2Factive-sitting%2Fproducts%2Fclassic-balance-ball-chair%3Fvariant%3D32936592129&#38;xcust=1617296708223aeyzbj3he%7Cxid:fr1617296718710adc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Gaiam Balance Ball Chair</a> and the benefits it provides still make it a worthy addition to your office if you're looking for a way to improve your posture.&#160;</p>\n\tThe best for back pain\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5eb466a4cdfd480b6b171183?format=jpeg\" alt=\"best active seating Varier Variable Balans Kneeling Chair\" height=\"1000\" width=\"1333\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Varier</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><strong>If you're looking for active seating that doesn't involve perching, leaning, or wobbling, the</strong> <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B06XXP15CW/ref=as_li_tl?ots=1&#38;slotNum=41&#38;imprToken=e6bc4732-adf5-d636-a21&#38;ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_112017_best-active-seating-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B06XXP15CW&#38;linkId=3f8451b8935d6a297f20089f72a5bd88\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><strong>Varier Variable Balans Kneeling Chair</strong></a><strong> is ideal.</strong></h3><p><strong>Pros: </strong>Encourages a posture that relieves back pain, durable design</p><p><strong>Cons: </strong>Not compatible with a standing desk, may put too much pressure on knees for some</p><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><ul><li><p><strong>Height range: </strong>Up to 6'5\"<strong><br /></strong></p></li><li><p><strong>Weight limit: 240 pounds</strong></p></li><li><p><strong>Dimensions (LWH):</strong> 28.8 x 21.3 x 4.1 inches</p></li><li><strong>Weight: </strong>14 pounds</li></ul></aside><p>Most active seating options come in the form of a stool or exercise ball, but the<a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B06XXP15CW/ref=as_li_tl?ots=1&#38;slotNum=42&#38;imprToken=e6bc4732-adf5-d636-a21&#38;ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_112017_best-active-seating-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B06XXP15CW&#38;linkId=3f8451b8935d6a297f20089f72a5bd88\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"> Varier Variable Balans Kneeling</a><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B06XXP15CW/ref=as_li_tl?ots=1&#38;slotNum=43&#38;imprToken=e6bc4732-adf5-d636-a21&#38;ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_112017_best-active-seating-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B06XXP15CW&#38;linkId=3f8451b8935d6a297f20089f72a5bd88\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"> Chair</a> has you kneel at your desk rather than sit. The kneeling position prompts you to shift more than sitting in a traditional desk chair. It also takes the pressure off both the spine and hips. This is a great solution if you suffer from back pain, and you're looking for a way to change up your sitting routine throughout the day.</p><p>First designed in 1979, the<a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B06XXP15CW/ref=as_li_tl?ots=1&#38;slotNum=44&#38;imprToken=e6bc4732-adf5-d636-a21&#38;ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biipgf_112017_best-active-seating-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B06XXP15CW&#38;linkId=3f8451b8935d6a297f20089f72a5bd88\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"> Varier Variable Balans</a> consists of a wooden frame and large cushions for comfortable support. The two knee rests are positioned at an optimal width to open up your hips and take pressure off your spine. The legs are slightly curved, allowing it to rock slightly. This allows you to lean forward and back with more freedom, extending your reach and increasing your mobility.</p><p>The Variable Balans works well with a traditional desk, but it won't be compatible with a standing desk.&#160;</p><p>Some users have complained that putting their weight on their knees gets uncomfortable throughout the day, but it's important to engage your core muscles while using this chair. That way, you won't be straining your knees and instead rely on your other muscles to hold you up.</p>\n\tHow to choose the right active seating option for you\n\t\n\t<p>It's important to note that active seating is a lot like a new exercise. Since you'll be utilizing your core more than you would in a normal desk chair, it does take some getting used to. You'll want to build up to using your active seat more throughout the day gradually. Below are a few other factors you'll want to consider to find the perfect style of active seating for you.</p><ul><li aria-level=\"1\"><strong>What style do you want? </strong>Based on your setup, you'll want something that works with your traditional, standing, or height-adjustable desk. You'll also want a seat that will work best for you, whether you want to engage your core or improve your posture.&#160;</li><li aria-level=\"1\"><strong>Is it height adjustable? </strong>This is important not only for allowing you to rest in the optimal position but also so it can be compatible with a sit-stand desk, if you have one.</li><li aria-level=\"1\"><strong>How much cushioning do you want? </strong>How much cushioning you need will depend on how often you want to use active seating. If you plan on switching back and forth between active seating and your normal office chair you may not need as much.</li><li aria-level=\"1\"><strong>How much space will it take up? </strong>If you don't have much space to spare, or you travel often and want to take your seat with you, you may want to consider a collapsible or portable style of active seating.</li><li aria-level=\"1\"><strong>Is it easy to assemble? </strong>The easier it is to assemble, the more quickly you'll be able to start using your new office chair.</li></ul>\n\tCheck out our other office gear guides\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5a0f0f4f3dbef482008b6b2b?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Varidesk standing desk image\" height=\"1018\" width=\"1357\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Amazon</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-standing-desk\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">The best standing desks</a></h3><hr data-uri=\"18a34ac984b0eaae3b22940000d05d74\">Enhanced Clean program</a>. </li>\n</ul><p>Myrtle Beach is a popular summertime destination for its lovely stretch of coastline known as the Grand Strand and a busy downtown filled with amusements and attractions. Located just north of Charleston, South Carolina, Myrtle Beach draws big summer crowds but shoulder seasons like spring and fall offer cheaper rates and fewer crowds.</p><p>It&#39;s a personal favorite of mine after writing about consumer and leisure travel in the area for over 20 years and I highly recommend the local vacation rental market.</p><p>Rentals like those found on Airbnb are a great way to claim more space to spread out, and often for cheaper than you&#39;ll find in hotels. Here are my top picks for your next getaway.</p><aside class=\"quick-tip headline-regular\"><p><strong>The best Airbnb rentals in Myrtle Beach were chosen based on the following criteria:</strong></p><ol><li>Airbnb listings are for the entire home/apartment in line with social distancing guidelines.</li><li aria-level=\"1\">Every host is committed to Airbnb&#39;s <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/airbnb-new-cleaning-protocol\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"20\" data-uri=\"18a34ac984b0eaae3b22940000d05d74\">Enhanced Clean program</a>, a five-step cleaning process developed in partnership with health and hospitality experts. </li><li>The home is priced under $300 per night, outside of peak seasons when you should expect higher rates.</li><li>All Myrtle Beach Airbnbs are highly rated with a review score of 4.5 or higher.</li><li>Every listing has comforts you&#39;ll want in a beach vacation such as air conditioning, access to a beach or a pool, and extra amenities like beach chairs or grills.</li><li>Properties are well-appointed and stand out either for design or location (or both), and are close to area attractions.</li><li>The home is available to book in the coming weeks and months, as of publishing.</li></ol></aside><h3><strong>Browse the best Myrtle Beach Airbnbs below, or jump directly to a
