There isn't a wall-mounted fish in sight.&#160;</p><p>This 18th-floor space is huge with a thoughtful selection of polished, hardwood, midcentury modern pieces, all set against rich but subtle red carpeting. Granite worktops in the fully-equipped kitchen and three balcony spaces with views of the ocean and the SkyWheel add to the allure. The master bedroom also comes with ocean views through the floor-to-ceiling windows.</p><p>Bayview Resort allows guests to access indoor pools, a lazy river, hot tub, fitness room, and a splash deck.&#160;</p><p>There are still open dates for July and August, plus later fall.</p><aside class=\"quick-tip headline-regular\"><p><strong>Sleeps</strong>: 12 guests/3 bedrooms</p><p><strong>Rating</strong>: 5.0</p></aside>\n\tLarge oceanfront condo, $204\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/60707b474943790018bb1a31?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Large oceanfront condo in Myrtle Beach\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Airbnb</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.airbnb.com%2Frooms%2F36175560\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><strong>Book this condo in Myrtle Beach on Airbnb starting at $204 per night</strong></a></h2><p>This is a great spot for larger groups with a prime Ocean Boulevard location overlooking lots of great restaurants and entertainment options.&#160;</p><p>The decor is a kaleidoscope of patterns flanked by views of the beautiful Atlantic streaming in through the wrap-around, ceiling-to-floor windows. Traditional wooden dining tables mix with leather sofas and jazzy, floral print curtains and carpets for an eclectic look that certainly stands out. Kids and parents will love the Dunes Village Resort with its heated pools, Jacuzzi, lazy river, and water slides.&#160;</p><p>Summer is busy, but there are plenty of dates from late September onwards.&#160;</p><aside class=\"quick-tip headline-regular\"><p><strong>Sleeps</strong>: 10 guests/2 bedrooms</p><p><strong>Rating</strong>: 4.89</p></aside>\n\tBeautiful four-bedroom house, $297\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/60707bfa4943790018bb1a36?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Beautiful four bedroom house in Myrtle Beach\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Airbnb</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h2><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.airbnb.com%2Frooms%2F31827360\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Book this house in Myrtle Beach on Airbnb starting at $297 per night</a></h2><p>Set 200 yards from the ocean, and just steps from the dining and entertainment options of Grand Strand, this home enjoys a plum location right in the thick of things.&#160;</p><p>The open plan design opens up thanks to high, cathedral ceilings and hardwood floors, and the four bedroom/three bathroom arrangement means that three families could share this space while maintaining a modicum of privacy.</p><p>There are patio decks on both floors, with a grill on the second, and smart TVs throughout for entertaining the kids. There's also a shared community pool.&#160;</p><p>Dates are available from late August onwards, with full availability for the fall.&#160;</p><aside class=\"quick-tip headline-regular\"><p><strong>Sleeps</strong>: 11 guests/4 bedrooms</p><p><strong>Rating</strong>: 4.98</p></aside>\n\tFAQ: Visiting Myrtle Beach\n\t\n\t<h2><strong>Where is Myrtle Beach?</strong></h2><p>Myrtle Beach is a seaside destination in South Carolina, located around two hours or so north of Charleston along a stretch of coast known as The Grand Strand.</p><p>In contrast to the somewhat refined Charleston, Myrtle Beach is much more skewed to families and tourists, and is an unpretentious, down-to-earth coastal getaway that gets very busy at peak times, such as summer</p><h2><strong>Where should I vacation in Myrtle Beach?</strong></h2><p>Where you stay in Myrtle Beach depends a lot on your budget and personal tastes. Along the oceanfront, the north end is generally held to be more contemporary, with the south end having older properties.</p><p>Ocean Boulevard is the main drag that runs parallel to the beaches with busy spots around Wither Heights and Yaupon Circle. Families will probably want the ease of being close to the action and the sands, while couples or older visitors may want to stay a few blocks back from the seafront, and there are quieter residential areas around the country clubs and golf courses away from the clamor.</p><p>There are many units within gated resorts, from brands such as Marriott and Sheraton, and some independent complexes. These places have shared community pools and other leisure facilities, some even having small water parks. The vast majority of the accommodations in Myrtle Beach are close to the beaches.&#160;</p><h2><strong>How much does it cost to rent a vacation house in Myrtle Beach?</strong></h2><p>If you want to book a private vacation rental in Myrtle Beach, the cost will depend on factors such as house or unit size, proximity to the beach and downtown, added amenities such as a pool, plus the time of year and the day of the week that you plan to visit.</p><p>It will also, as noted, depend on whether you're renting inside a gated resort community or not. Myrtle Beach gets incredibly busy during the summer and over holiday weekends.&#160;</p><p>For example, a small unit in a resort might start at less than $75 per night off season, but surge to over $300 per night for a summer weekend. A large, lavish beach house could be closer to a thousand dollars or more per night at any time.</p><p>For better deals, as well as increased availability, visit in shoulder seasons like spring or fall when the weather is still quite pleasant and there are fewer crowds and less competition for inventory. If you're set on a summer trip to Myrtle Beach, plan to increase your budget or consider only staying midweek for lower rates.</p><p>Expect to pay, at minimum, a few hundred dollars for a short midweek stay off season, or over one thousand dollars for a weekend or summer visit in a higher-end property. B</p><p>Also, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/airbnbs-cancellation-policy\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">be aware of cancellation policies and read the fine print</a>, as some homes have strict rules and service fees. You may also want to check <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/airbnb-vrbo-homeaway\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">other home rental sites</a>&#160;before you book to make sure you're getting the best deal. Finally, as the global pandemic continues, be aware that shared amenities such as pools or gyms may be closed. Be sure to check with the host before booking if accessing such facilities is important to your stay.</p><h2><strong>What is there to do in Myrtle Beach?</strong></h2><p>Myrtle Beach is a casual, family-focused resort town, with 60 miles of brown sand along the Grand Strand, framed by amusement and water parks, shopping malls, family attractions, chain restaurants, golf courses, and country clubs.</p><p>The major attractions center around families and golfing, with theme parks including the Family Kingdom Amusement Park, Myrtle Waves Water Park, and the NASCAR SpeedPark. Ripley's Aquarium and the SkyWheel are also huge draws.</p><p>Some of the best golf courses include Dunes Golf &#38; Beach Club, Caledonia Golf Club, Tidewater Golf Club and Grande Dunes Resort Club.</p><h2>Is Airbnb safe?</h2><p>The CDC now says&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/cdc-fully-vaccinated-travelers-can-now-travel-in-the-us-2021-4\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"303f476a077d8164f790a3cf23ec1cf6\">fully vaccinated people can safely travel in the US</a>.</p><p>Additionally, experts say&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/are-airbnbs-safe-coronavirus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"1e6ea0063f937a96dc22dade5b4c7c6e\">Airbnb is safe</a>, especially&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/which-is-safer-airbnb-hotels-coronavirus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"3aa44a069ccdebdc5c7e8b56165c0439\">compared to hotels</a>, because they eliminate interactions with others. Airbnb hosts must also follow&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/airbnb-new-cleaning-protocol\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"body_link\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"18a34ac984b0eaae3b22940000d05d74\">enhanced cleaning g</a>uidelines.</p><p>Of course, there are still risks and we recommend following CDC guidelines, practicing social distancing, double masking, and washing hands frequently.</p>\n\tMore East Coast beach getaways\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6070b48f4943790018bb1bc5?format=jpeg\" deodorant that actually works</a>.</strong></li>\n</ul><p>In recent years, Target has made a massive effort to bring on clean, natural, sustainable, or otherwise eco-friendly brands - so you can worry less about buyer&#39;s remorse on your next shopping spree.</p><p>From the recycled packaging of <a store carries ethically made beauty products at prices we love. Consider it the new &#34;triple threat&#34; - safe ingredients, sustainable packaging, and accessible pricing. </p><p>Target currently carries nearly 2,800 beauty products tagged with a <a href=\"https://goto.target.com/c/196318/81938/2092?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.target.com%2Fc%2Ftarget-clean%2F-%2FN-p4n12\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Target Clean</a> symbol, so you can make a more informed buying decision quickly and easily. These products meet Target&#39;s own clean standards, so you won&#39;t find formulas with parabens, sulfates, and other ingredients included on the retailer&#39;s &#34;No List.&#34; <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/clean-beauty-brands-at-target/#-12\">Read more about this in our clean beauty FAQ, below</a>.</p><p><picture><source srcset=\"https://target.scene7.com/is/image/Target/_ImagePathLarge-201130-1606770993499?scl=1&qlt=60&fmt=webpfmt=webp\" media=\"(min-width: 1200px)\"><source srcset=\"https://target.scene7.com/is/image/Target/_ImagePathLarge-201130-1606770993499?scl=1&qlt=60&fmt=webpfmt=webp\" media=\"(min-width: 992px)\"><source srcset=\"https://target.scene7.com/is/image/Target/_ImagePathLarge-201130-1606770993499?scl=1&qlt=60&fmt=webpfmt=webp\" media=\"(min-width: 668px)\"><source srcset=\"https://target.scene7.com/is/image/Target/_ImagePath-201130-1606770989072?scl=1&qlt=60&fmt=webpfmt=webp\" media=\"(min-width: 0px)\"></picture></p><h3>Here are the 11 best clean beauty brands and products you can shop at Target:</h3>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tHonest Beauty\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/606370b421887500193e833c?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Honest Beauty EXTREME LENGTH MASCARA &#43; LASH PRIMER \" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Honest Beauty</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Why we love it: </strong>Founded by Jessica Alba, The Honest Company hits the two main components of clean beauty: transparency and safe ingredients. Each product follows a \"no list\" which is an evolving list of over 2,500 chemicals the brand chooses not to use. Honest also avoids listing fragrance as an ingredient because it can be used as an umbrella term to hide harmful ingredients. We love the Hydrogel Cream and 2-in-1 Mascara that's won several beauty awards.&#160;</p><p><strong>Products you should try:</strong></p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"606f60733b0eb30019e265ed\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Hydrogel Cream with Hyaluronic Acid (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"606f61a43b0eb30019e265f0\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Extreme Length 2-in-1 Mascara and Lash Primer (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\tFunction of Beauty\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6066092852f11d0019431a29?format=jpeg\" alt=\"FOB Target\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Target</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Why we love it:</strong> Function of Beauty has changed the world of beauty forever with its line of customizable haircare. (We're big fans of the Coconut &#38; Vanilla scent for its refreshing tropical smell) As a member of <a href=\"https://www.onepercentfortheplanet.org/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">1% for the Planet</a>, Native donates 1% of Plastic Free sales to fight plastic pollution. Switching from the Classic packaging to Native Plastic Free will help reduce plastic waste by about 169 tons each year.&#160;</p><p><a href=\"https://www.insider.com/native-deodorant-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Read our full review of Native deodorant here</a>.&#160;</p><p><strong>Products you should try:</strong></p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"606f712e3b0eb30019e26600\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Coconut &#38; Vanilla Deodorant (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"606f71cb3b0eb30019e26603\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Coconut &#38; Vanilla Body Wash (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\tMethod\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/60636ef021887500193e8330?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Method Men Body Wash\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Target</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Why we love it:</strong> Method makes cleanliness, well, clean. About 60% of the brand's bottles, tubes, and boxes are recyclable.</p><p><strong>Products you should try:</strong></p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"606f742ec3c9840018e7e9d8\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Dew Point Moisturizing Gel-Cream (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5fd0eb40bca41b7e410d2715\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Day Dissolve Cleansing Balm (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\tLove Beauty and Planet\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/60635bfa67187800184ad56f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Love Beauty and Planet Soothe and Nourish Hemp Seed Shampoo\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Target</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Why we love it:</strong> Personal-care company <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.target.com%2Fb%2Flove-beauty-and-planet%2F-%2FN-uuny4\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Love Beauty and Planet</a> is all about the little things, making small tweaks to the sourcing, formulating, and design processes for its products (which include haircare, deodorant, and even dish soap), to cut down on waste in more ways than one.</p><p>For starters, every bottle is made from 100% recycled materials and can be recycled (by you) once they're empty. The ingredients are ethically sourced and organic; and while that's great for your skin and hair, it's <em>also </em>great for the fair-wage workers that harvest said ingredients. <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.target.com%2Fs%3FsearchTerm%3Dlove%2Bbeauty%2Band%2Bplanet\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Love Beauty and Planet's haircare products</a> feature something they call \"fast-rinse technology,\" which means you can take shorter showers and save water.&#160;</p><p><strong>Products you should try:</strong></p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5cdc20d3021b4c6d660ec456\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Tea Tree Oil &#38; Vetiver Radical Refresher Conditioner (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"5cdc20d3021b4c6d660ec456\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Tea Tree Oil &#38; Vetiver Radical Refresher Conditioner (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\tHello\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/60635e41c9d73b00186e933e?format=jpeg\" alt=\"hello Activated Charcoal Whitening Fluoride Toothpaste\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Target</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Why we love it:</strong> Toothpaste may be an afterthought for some, but many traditional formulas feature less-than-natural ingredients and potentially harmful chemicals, like parabens and peroxide. rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">foundation</a> and <a sponsored\">highlighter</a> to <a Plus, one of the founders is a professional makeup artist, so you know the formulas hold up.</p><p><strong>Products you should try:</strong></p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"606f7897c3c9840018e7e9ea\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Expressionist Pro Mascara (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"606f78173b0eb30019e2661a\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Bio Tint Multi-Action Moisturizer with SPF 30 (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\tSaalt\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/60635ea9c9d73b00186e9340?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Saalt Soft Menstrual Cup   Regular\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Target</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Why we love it:</strong> \"In the US alone, 20 billion menstrual products are disposed of annually,\" Cherie Hoeger and Amber Fawson, the founders of <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.target.com%2Fb%2Fsaalt%2F-%2FN-u8tvz\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">menstrual cup company Saalt</a>, told Insider. Traditional pads and tampons are among the most polluting products on the planet, turning women toward alternatives like the Saalt Cup.</p><p><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.target.com%2Fb%2Fsaalt%2F-%2FN-u8tvz\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Saalt's medical-grade silicone menstrual cups</a> are inserted like a tampon to collect menstrual fluid. They can be reused for up to 10 years, making menstrual cups \"one of the simplest ways to divert massive amounts of waste,\" said the founders. It's a safe, hassle-free period experience, too. It's pretty comfortable (I promise), can be worn for up to 12 hours at a time, and it also translates to over thousands in savings, since you no longer have to buy tampons or pads every month.</p><p><strong>Products to try:</strong></p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"606f7a5d9761310019cad765\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Soft Menstrual Cups (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"606f7b519761310019cad768\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Citrus Menstrual Cup Wash (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\tRael\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/6063615a67187800184ad581?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Rael\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Rael</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Why we love it: </strong>These feminine products use a natural pulp core and non-toxic adhesive, making <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.target.com%2Fb%2Frael%2F-%2FN-jz06c\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Rael's products</a> as clean and eco-friendly as possible, said Yanghee Paik, a co-founder of <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.target.com%2Fb%2Frael%2F-%2FN-jz06c\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">organic, feminine-care company Rael</a>.&#160;</p><p>\"The traditional pads I'd been using contained not only chlorine, fragrance, and pesticides, but also carcinogens and irritants such as styrene (used in car tires), chloromethane (used in petroleum refining), and acetone (nail polish remover), which can often cause cramps, allergic reactions, and skin irritations,\" Paik said.&#160;&#160;</p><p>The brand's <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/reviews/out?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.target.com%2Fp%2Frael-organic-cotton-regular-menstrual-pads-unscented-14ct%2F-%2FA-75664184%23lnk%3Dsametab\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">organic cotton pads</a> are now available at Target, making them \"easily accessible to all women around the country,\" as Paik says. They're also priced in line with non-organic options ($4.99-$6.99).</p><p><strong>Products you should try:</strong></p><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"606f7cb53b0eb30019e2661d\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Organic Cotton Regular Menstrual Pads (small)</bi-shortcode><bi-shortcode id=\"commerce-link\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-cardtype=\"small\" data-pid=\"606f7d3fc3c9840018e7e9f0\" data-purchase-option=\"\">Organic Cotton Regular &#38; Super Tampons (small)</bi-shortcode>\n\t\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/606e120030004b0019b26857?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Reviews Style and Beauty FAQ Banner\" height=\"210\" width=\"1667\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>What does Target Clean mean?</h3><p>Target Clean is a new, easy way to identify products formulated without harmful ingredients. Look for the Target Clean symbol in store and online to find over 4,000 products that meet their clean standard.</p><p>All beauty products certified as Target Clean are formulated <em>without</em> the following: propyl-parabens, butyl-parabens, phthalates, formaldehyde, formaldehyde-donors, nonylphenol ethoxylates (NPEs), Oxybenzone, SLES, retinyl palmitate, hydroquinone, triclosan, triclocarban, BHA &#38; BHT.</p><ul><li>Deodorant: Additionally formulated without aluminum.</li><li>Oral care: Additionally formulated without artificial sweeteners.</li></ul><h3>What is considered clean beauty?</h3><p>Clean beauty follows two simple standards: transparency and safe ingredients. You should know exactly what you're getting with a glance at the label. As for safe ingredients, the <a href=\"https://thegoodfaceproject.com/good_face_index\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Good Face Index</a> ranks every cosmetic ingredient based on safety and toxicity. But some general ones to avoid are parabens, sulfates, oxybenzone, and formaldehyde.</p><p>Just because a product is organic, natural, or green, doesn't mean it's non-toxic. Manmade ingredients are clean as long as they're safe and non-toxic. This also means that clean beauty doesn't have to be all-natural, preservative-free, etc.</p><p>In Europe, over 1,300 potentially harmful chemicals are banned from cosmetics. In the United States, that number is just 11. Unfortunately, clean beauty products are not regulated by the FDA, so it's up to the brand's discretion.&#160;</p>\n</div><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a 2021 22:15:51 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/606e0c2530004b0019b26835?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"25ead7cb24a9930624dffb511fa78873","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn84@2020_1/2021/04/10/03-46-09-037_3ee5cacdd198a719.webp","destWidth":1666,"destHeight":1249,"sourceBytes":96358,"destBytes":96358,"author":"ehoffman@businessinsider.com (Jessica DeFino,Jacqueline Saguin)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/606e0c1330004b0019b26833?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn52@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-46-10-259_77e6ae64a76ac72a.webp","https://i.insider.com/606370b421887500193e833c?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn44@2020_3/2021/04/10/03-46-04-968_0cb07b9a48f6b19d.webp","https://i.insider.com/6066092852f11d0019431a29?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn12@2020_1/2021/04/10/03-45-55-059_6c0cf21452290681.webp","https://i.insider.com/60636e006183e10019819560?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn67@2020_1/2021/04/10/03-46-10-222_cde6c5d5670e1dad.webp","https://i.insider.com/60636d476183e10019819559?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn35@2020_2/2021/04/10/03-46-02-490_1d6d5162f2deb935.webp","https://i.insider.com/60636ef021887500193e8330?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn11@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-46-04-966_a31df236a8e4194f.webp","https://i.insider.com/60635765c9d73b00186e931f?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn84@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-46-05-300_1da04118492185fc.webp","https://i.insider.com/60635bfa67187800184ad56f?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn48@2020_1/2021/04/10/03-46-04-330_aa7b542024de20af.webp","https://i.insider.com/60635e41c9d73b00186e933e?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn67@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-46-03-507_664f0a7f460169a6.webp","https://i.insider.com/6066099552f11d0019431a2c?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn44@2020_1/2021/04/10/03-45-56-603_a017ae0dfb660eb2.webp","https://i.insider.com/60635ea9c9d73b00186e9340?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn35@2020_3/2021/04/10/03-46-06-872_dea1ec8058340c08.webp","https://i.insider.com/6063615a67187800184ad581?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn19@2020_3/2021/04/10/03-45-58-901_71c19d401f912196.webp","https://i.insider.com/606e120030004b0019b26857?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn4@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-46-10-883_70d990bfab00fd6f.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn43@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-46-06-040_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=9KmlUGRzNQc:PNm315bViQ4:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn12@2020_4/2021/04/10/03-46-09-609_21f67b6d3b10a747.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=9KmlUGRzNQc:PNm315bViQ4:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn36@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-45-58-290_168786b6107fdaac.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn75@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-46-00-486_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=9KmlUGRzNQc:PNm315bViQ4:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn88@2020_4/2021/04/10/03-46-05-408_4d75046b6ed3ea6d.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/9KmlUGRzNQc":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn32@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-45-55-323_e0930c3e273159a1.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1618026331650},{"createdTime":"2021-04-10 11:45:31","updatedTime":"2021-04-10 11:45:31","title":"How to use VLOOKUP in Google Sheets to search for specific data and replicate it across spreadsheets","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/vlookup-google-sheets","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/606fc1da30004b0019b26ca2?format=jpeg\" alt=\"woman on laptop\" height=\"1987\" width=\"3974\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>VLOOKUP, otherwise known as &#34;vertical lookup,&#34; is a search action that can be used on Google Sheets similar to the way it works on Excel.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Guido Mieth/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li aria-level=\"1\">You can use VLOOKUP with Google Sheets; it&#39;s similar to how the function works in Excel.</li>\n<li aria-level=\"1\">The VLOOKUP formula can find values in tables on the same sheet or a different sheet, but it can only find values to the right of the search key. </li>\n<li aria-level=\"1\">You can use wildcards like an asterisk and question mark to find partial matches as well.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tech-reference\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\"><strong>Visit Insider&#39;s Tech Reference library for more stories</strong></a><strong>.</strong></li>\n</ul><p>VLOOKUP is a commonly used search function that lets you look up a value in one table and use it in another. It takes its name from the fact that it performs a &#34;vertical lookup&#34; - it searches a specified column vertically for a search key and then returns the value you&#39;re looking for from the same row. </p><p>VLOOKUP works more or less the same way in both <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-use-excel\">Excel</a> and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/google-sheets\">Google Sheets</a>; if you already know <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-do-vlookup-in-excel\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">how to use VLOOKUP in Excel</a>, making the transition to Google is not difficult. There&#39;s no wizard in Google Sheets, though, so you&#39;ll need to enter all the values manually.</p><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><h2><strong>How to use VLOOKUP with Google Sheets</strong></h2><p>The easiest way to understand how to use VLOOKUP is with an example. Imagine you have a table in a Google Sheet that represents data about products in inventory, including part number, name, price, and so on. If you want to create a second table that only includes the part number and price, you could use VLOOKUP to extract price from the spreadsheet knowing only the part number.</p><p><strong><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/606fc72a4d3e410018b7026c?format=jpeg\" alt=\"How to use VLOOKUP with Google Sheets 2\" height=\"610\" width=\"1083\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>This is a hypothetical spreadsheet which we&#39;d like to extract information from using VLOOKUP.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Dave Johnson/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></strong><strong><br></strong></p><ol><li aria-level=\"1\">Enter the part number you want to find and then, in the field next to it, enter &#34;=VLOOKUP&#34; and press tab to start entering the arguments of the formula.  </li><li aria-level=\"1\">The first argument is the search key, which is the part number you just entered in the cell to the left. Either type the value into the formula or click the cell to the left to automatically enter it into the formula. Type a comma. </li><li aria-level=\"1\">The second argument is the range. You&#39;ll want to specify the set of columns to include in the search. You can type it, as in &#34;A:E&#34; or click on the first column header and then drag the mouse to the last column in the table. Type a comma. </li><li aria-level=\"1\">The third argument is the column that contains the value you&#39;re looking for. In this example, we want the price, which is the third column in the range. Type a 3 and add a comma. </li><li aria-level=\"1\">Type &#34;False&#34; and add the closing parenthesis. <br><p><br>The final formula will look like this: </p><p><strong>=VLOOKUP(G2,A:E,3,false) </strong></p><p><strong><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/606fc78b4d3e410018b7026e?format=jpeg\" alt=\"How to use VLOOKUP with Google Sheets 3\" height=\"494\" width=\"878\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Here is a completed VLOOKUP formula.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Dave Johnson/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></strong></p><p>You should see the result appear in the cell with the formula. </p><p>You can drag this cell down to copy it to subsequent cells in the column. For example, if you have a lot of parts, this would help you quickly make a table of prices for part numbers. </p><p><strong><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/606fc8774d3e410018b70271?format=jpeg\" alt=\"How to use VLOOKUP with Google Sheets 4\" height=\"893\" width=\"1588\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>If you copy the cell with the VLOOKUP formula down, it will replicate the formula in every cell.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Dave Johnson/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></strong></p><p>One important note: VLOOKUP can&#39;t return a value that is to the left of the search key, so you&#39;ll need to be sure the value you are looking for in the table is to the right of the search key.</p></li></ol></aside><h2>Understanding VLOOKUP syntax</h2><p>Here is what the VLOOKUP formula looks like:</p><p><strong>=VLOOKUP(search_key, range, index, [is_sorted])</strong></p><ul><li aria-level=\"1\"><strong>The &#34;search_key&#34;</strong> is the value you want to search for. For example, if you want to know the price of a product, you might search for the product name or item number in the same row. </li><li aria-level=\"1\"><strong>The range</strong> is the columns that contain the data.</li><li aria-level=\"1\"><strong>The index</strong> is the column that contains the value you want to find. In the example of finding the price of a product, this is the price column. Rather than using the column letter, you number the columns in the range; the first column is 1, and so on.</li><li aria-level=\"1\"><strong>The final value</strong> is &#34;true&#34; or &#34;false&#34; and is used to indicate if the index column has been sorted. It&#39;s optional, but defaults to &#34;true&#34; if you don&#39;t include it - which will give you the wrong result if the table isn&#39;t sorted. </li></ul><p><strong><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/606fc8e04d3e410018b70272?format=jpeg\" alt=\"How to use VLOOKUP with Google Sheets 1\" height=\"383\" width=\"682\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>This is what the VLOOKUP formula looks like in Google Sheets.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Dave Johnson/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></strong></p><h2>How to use VLOOKUP on multiple sheets</h2><p>That procedure will help you build a VLOOKUP table if you&#39;re extracting information from a table on the same sheet, but if you want to build a table on a different sheet, you&#39;ll need to make one small change: You need to modify the range to an absolute value that references the name of the spreadsheet.</p><p>For example, suppose you have a Google Sheets workbook with a sheet named &#34;Parts&#34; and you want to extract prices but store them on a new sheet named &#34;Audit.&#34; The range needs to be prefaced with the name of the sheet and an exclamation mark (!). The formula will look the same but instead of this:</p><p><strong>=VLOOKUP(G2,A:E,3,false) </strong></p><p>It needs to look like this:</p><p><strong>=VLOOKUP(G2,Audit!A:E,3,false)</strong></p><h2>How to use VLOOKUP with a wildcard</h2><p>You can also use VLOOKUP to search for partial matches using wildcards - you simply need to use the asterisk (*) or question mark (?) in the search key. The asterisk can be used to match any sequence of characters, while the question mark only replaces a single character.</p><p><strong><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/606fc97c4d3e410018b70273?format=jpeg\" alt=\"How to use VLOOKUP with Google Sheets 5\" height=\"778\" width=\"1384\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>You can use a wildcard symbol to search for a partial index term.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Dave Johnson/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></strong></p><aside class=\"breakout-box headline-regular\"><h2><strong>How to use VLOOKUP to find the closest match</strong></h2><p>While most of the time you&#39;ll want to find an exact match, you might sometimes need to find the closest match. For example, suppose you are looking for a part that&#39;s less than a target price. Here&#39;s how to do that:</p><ol><li aria-level=\"1\">Sort the index column - in other words, the column with the price you are looking for. If you don&#39;t sort the table, you won&#39;t get accurate results. To do that, select the first row, then click &#34;Data&#34; in the menu. Choose &#34;Sort sheet by column A -&#62; Z.&#34;</li><li aria-level=\"1\">Enter your formula as you normally would. </li><li aria-level=\"1\">To complete the formula, set the &#34;is_sorted&#34; argument to &#34;True.&#34;<br><br></li></ol><p><strong><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/606fc9f530004b0019b26cad?format=jpeg\" alt=\"How to use VLOOKUP with Google Sheets 6\" height=\"782\" width=\"1390\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The VLOOKUP formula can understand wildcards and complete searches with partial terms.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Dave Johnson/Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></strong></p></aside><bi-shortcode id=\"related-article-module-end-of-article\" class=\"mceNonEditable\"><a data-type=\"6022da699dad2334224f7843\" (Dave Johnson)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/606fc1da30004b0019b26ca2?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn24@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-45-53-942_1621498411691817.webp","https://i.insider.com/606fc72a4d3e410018b7026c?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn95@2020_2/2021/04/10/03-46-04-740_835dfbba0167fea3.webp","https://i.insider.com/606fc78b4d3e410018b7026e?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn40@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-46-01-287_5ea3e93ee64dba64.webp","https://i.insider.com/606fc8774d3e410018b70271?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn43@2020_1/2021/04/10/03-46-07-207_d8a578e19808458d.webp","https://i.insider.com/606fc8e04d3e410018b70272?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn8@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-45-53-866_c2774ed9ccd3327c.webp","https://i.insider.com/606fc97c4d3e410018b70273?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn88@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-46-08-889_f2a40e9c32a1400a.webp","https://i.insider.com/606fc9f530004b0019b26cad?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn67@2020_3/2021/04/10/03-46-05-256_bcbe11bb388b4eec.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn43@2020_5/2021/04/10/03-46-06-040_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=BfeZk3Dcw5g:s4_uVe_VydU:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn16@2020_3/2021/04/10/03-46-01-178_b3351750012a03cd.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=BfeZk3Dcw5g:s4_uVe_VydU:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn84@2020_2/2021/04/10/03-46-07-796_8fb47afc2d64db11.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn75@2020_6/2021/04/10/03-46-00-486_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=BfeZk3Dcw5g:s4_uVe_VydU:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn92@2020_3/2021/04/10/03-45-54-318_6a80bf781de26b10.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/BfeZk3Dcw5g":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn68@2020_1/2021/04/10/03-46-04-384_b75a4677c859f8e5.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1618026331899},{"createdTime":"2021-04-10 11:45:31","updatedTime":"2021-04-10 11:45:31","title":"House Ethics Committee launches investigation into Rep. Matt Gaetz over allegations of sexual misconduct","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/house-ethics-committee-opens-investigation-into-rep-matt-gaetz-2021-4","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/606c6787a7d803001963eeea?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Matt Gaetz\" height=\"2374\" width=\"4748\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Rep. Matt Gaetz.\n<p class=\"copyright\">AP</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>The House Ethics Committee said Friday that it would launch an investigation into Rep. Matt Gaetz.</li>\n<li>It cited allegations of sexual misconduct and drug use and reports that he&#39;d shown photos of nude women to colleagues.</li>\n<li>The committee also opened a sexual-misconduct investigation into Rep. Tom Reed.</li>\n<li id=\"recirc\"><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">See more stories on Insider&#39;s business page</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>The House Ethics Committee announced on Friday that it was launching an investigation into GOP Rep. Matt Gaetz of Florida over allegations of sexual misconduct and illicit drug use and reports that he had <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/rep-matt-gaetz-showed-nude-photos-women-lawmakers-cnn-report-2021-4\">shown photos of nude women to colleagues</a> on the House floor.</p><p>The committee also opened an investigation into Rep. Tom Reed over allegations of sexual misconduct.</p><p>Gaetz is the focus of a federal criminal investigation into whether he had a sexual relationship with a minor and broke sex-trafficking laws.</p><p>The committee&#39;s investigation into Gaetz <a href=\"https://ethics.house.gov/press-releases/statement-chairman-and-ranking-member-committee-ethics-regarding-representative-22\">also covers</a> whether the Florida representative used campaign cash for personal use or whether he accepted a bribe or impermissible gift. Several House members, including <a href=\"https://www.google.com/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=&ved=2ahUKEwinp5iQ9_HvAhVUqZ4KHYQ4D_kQFjAAegQIBBAD&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.businessinsider.com%2Fgop-rep-adam-kinzinger-calls-on-matt-gaetz-to-resign-2021-4&usg=AOvVaw3xQgq1ME3Ipauc0-qERlj7usg=AOvVaw3xQgq1ME3Ipauc0-qERlj7\">at least one Republican</a>, Rep. Adam Kinzinger, have called for Gaetz to resign.</p><p>Gaetz&#39;s office said in a statement on Friday, &#34;Once again, the office will reiterate, these allegations are blatantly false and have not been validated by a single human being willing to put their name behind them.&#34;</p><p>On Thursday, lawyers representing Joel Greenberg, a former Florida tax collector and Gaetz associate, told a judge that he was on the cusp of a plea agreement. Greenberg was indicted on 33 counts as part of the wide-ranging sex-trafficking investigation; his cooperation with prosecutors would be <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/prosecutors-doj-veterans-react-joel-greenberg-plea-deal-matt-gaetz-2021-4\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">a seismic development</a> given his long friendship with Gaetz and knowledge of the activities being scrutinized.</p><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">-Cristina Marcos  (@cimarcos) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1380602616384786435?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">April 9, 2021</a></blockquote><script async=\"\" src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script><p>Gaetz has repeatedly denied the allegations against him and insisted the federal investigation is <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/matt-gaetz-sex-trafficking-extortion-investigation-explainer-timeline-2021-3\">part of an elaborate and convoluted scheme</a> to extort his family for $25 million.</p><p>Reed was accused of groping a lobbyist at a bar in 2017. He apologized in March, adding that he wouldn&#39;t run for another term in 2022.</p><p>&#34;We have already publicly addressed this situation and consistent with that are cooperating with the House Ethics Committee to bring this matter to conclusion,&#34; Reed <a href=\"https://twitter.com/nicholaswu12/status/1380609390479343617?s=20\">told the Politico reporter Nicholas Wu</a> on Friday.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/house-ethics-committee-opens-investigation-into-rep-matt-gaetz-2021-4'>Business
